comments: This  was really  fun! Starts off easy but gets harder, not near the ads of the  other games I have played. Takes extra words, hints are reasonable,  earning money is reasonable.  So far the best of the word connects !! Really happy with this game, will add to my phone  and get rid of the other word connect games that seem to have ad, after ad not to mention the high amount for hints! There is one reason I didn't  give it a 5, because some of the ads get stuck and you can't  exit,  overall  4.8!

I love this game! As others have stated it's very addictive! It's also challenging when you get up in the amount of games you played. My only problem is that when you're asked to watch a video to collect points, the video stops playing and and you don't collect the points. This has happened to me 5 times in a row. Other than that, I do not know what people are talking about as far as a lot of ads. I don't find that at all.

Not a bad time killer - quick paced and not too taxing on the brain. I wish it had a more comprehensive dictionary so you would still get bonus points for valid words like 'cad.' No matter - still basically a four star, though almost three for the number of ads.

The game isn't bad if you like word puzzles. My dislike comes from the fact that I have push notifications for this app turned off, but it somehow continues to manage to send them. It also keeps poor track of your coins. Good time killer.

Child-friendly! And, as an adult? I love how am yet to see an advertisement. üòä  Unlike other word games like Word Connect, it also lets you find and play words that are not necessarily those found on the board, storing it in an "Extra" slot, which generates added points to your score, rather than telling you to choose the word that's only on the board.  ADDENDUM: After reading the comments, it appears there may be ads after all. Am yet to see any though. Perhaps because am still in a lower level.

Excellent game. Quite fast response on my phone. There is as almost after every level but it's ok. You can quickly click the x to close the ad. I was hoping for long words more than 6 letters but it appears that this game has only up to six letter word puzzles. I am currently at 490 level.

descriptionHTML:
Are you tired of the old fashioned word search interfaces?
Do you want to enjoy a totally new experience of word puzzle game?
★★★ Now, you can download Word Cross and play on BOARDS for FREE! ★★★

Word Cross is a creative crossword puzzle game which can inspire your passion for brain challenges. It includes all the essences of word scramble games to make you feel totally ADDICTIVE & ENTERTAINING.

➤ New & Fresh Look: If you like to play board games and puzzle games, you must love the clean and fresh BOARD UI for your first sight.

➤ Handy & Easy to Play: You can easily swipe the letters to form a specific hidden word. It’s easy to play and fun to master for everyone.

➤ Surprising Bonus: Login everyday and get daily bonus, also, you will get coins after finding out the Extra Words which don't present on the crossword board.

➤ Over 2,000 Exciting Challenges: It starts easy and becomes challenging fast. And you can test your limits of the words you know. More levels are on the go.

➤ 100% Addictive Word Game: You’ll never experience a dull moment for it! Play this crossword puzzle once and you won’t be able to put it down!

☆ HOW TO PLAY ☆
- Swipe the letters to line up words to fill up the blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the “Shuffle” button to change the order of letters
- Tap "Ask Friends" when you get stuck and get rewards
- Tap the “Hints” button to get clues
- Get more hints with coins by purchasing or watching videos

★ FEATURES ★
• Nice & Clean BOARD for you (Stay tuned for customizable themes)
• More than 2000 Challenges
• FREE to get Daily Bonus
• Find words with bonus to collect more coins
• Simple & Easy to play, hard to beat gameplay
• Totally FREE for all players
• Suitable for both kids and adults to train word search skills
• No network required and you can enjoy word search at any time

DOWNLOAD now to begin training your brain and become a real master of word search puzzles on BOARDS!

★ CONTACT ★

comments: There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

I have just one piece of criticism... How is it that you're not selling these things as toys??? I want, like, all of them. For the love of God, make a Kickstarter if you must, but you need to make real Fluffies and sell them right now! The game's great, by the way, although I wish the Fluffy didn't cover the view so much, and I also wish the rainbow system thing was better explained, because I have no idea how it works. Keep it up!

It's interestingly successful. Im actually into the games with a good story or good music. Although this game contains neither Im actually loving it! The only comment that I would say is that I can't see much thing because of the fluffies are big, I usually mix coins or fire and avoid both :D

I love Fluffy Fall so much!! It is SUPER kawaii, fun, fuzzy, and enjoyable. It takes up your time as you try to beat your highscore!! Mine is 45.  I am really hoping that it updates, because I want all the monthly gem stones to be in stone section. I think it would be cool to have my gem stone. And play as it.  Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! üòäüíï

First of all, I was astonished by the graphics. It's simple to learn, and despite the lack of any instruction, I understood how to play immediately. It could honestly use a little more to do, long run, levels or other goals beyond what's already there, but for the time being it's a lot of fun.

Absolutely Love this! I've only been playing for at least an hour but it's so unbelievably adorable! I always try sticking with adventure games but any game with cute little puffblocks are always gonna be tested as well, I definitely recommend people of all ages to play üòÅ

Compete in contests against other jockeys online everyday with new and exciting events constantly galloping in. FEATURESRACE: ‚Ä¢¬†Ride your way to the top by competing in the local derby or circuit to win earnings and make your way toward the Ultimate Championship. ‚Ä¢ Races can be viewed in the intense and suspenseful manner just like a real-life derby or through quick results to get back to business. ‚Ä¢¬†Stunning 3D graphics and realistic photo finishes make Horse Racing Manager 2018 the best virtual horse racing simulation experience around! ‚Ä¢¬†Move through a realistic and immersive calendar of races. TRAIN: ‚Ä¢ Set regiments to prepare your horse for major upcoming matches. ‚Ä¢¬†Boost horse performance stats with food, rest and physical training. ‚Ä¢¬†Maintain and upgrade stats through a variety of training methods or breed horses to create the strongest and fiercest of bloodlines. ‚Ä¢¬†Exercise routines can vary in surface conditions, exertion levels and more. ‚Ä¢¬†Only the best of the best racing horse owners know how to keep their horses in peak form, well rested and at an optimal weight. ‚Ä¢¬†Need your horse to pack on a few pounds? CUSTOMIZE: ‚Ä¢¬†Choose a unique look for your jockey and horse with an assortment options. ‚Ä¢¬†Adjust the outfits, emblem and colors that suit your own personal taste.‚Ä¢ Bond with every horse in your stable by giving them individual names. ‚Ä¢¬†Customize a nurturing environment for your horses to flourish!  BREED: ‚Ä¢¬†Buy, sell and breed horses to participate competitions and create a powerhouse stable full of speedy candidates. ‚Ä¢ Match two horses with favorable traits to inherit special attributes and stats. ‚Ä¢ Rare breeds can be unlocked with special genetic traits such as zebra stripes or super speed.‚Ä¢ Be sure to breed carefully because unique skills can only be obtained through breeding and not trained.‚Ä¢ Participate in a slew of events that can affect special Breeding Rights.‚Ä¢ Stunning 3D visuals showcase an impressive variety of unique colors, patterns, and traits acquired through breeding.  Stop just watching the horse races and take part in the action. Saddle up cowboys, because the number one horse racing management sim is here! Horse Racing Manager 2018 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.Meet other players and find out more about Horse Racing Manager:* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/horseracingmanager2018* Twitter: @HRM_2018 (http://twitter.com/HRM_2018)* Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimePRIVACY* Terms of Service: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimeTOS
descriptionHTML:
Race, train and breed your way into becoming the number one horse racing manager! Rise through the ranks by winning derbies and cups to obtain the Ultimate Championship.

Compete in contests against other jockeys online everyday with new and exciting events constantly galloping in.

FEATURES

RACE:
• Ride your way to the top by competing in the local derby or circuit to win earnings and make your way toward the Ultimate Championship.
• Races can be viewed in the intense and suspenseful manner just like a real-life derby or through quick results to get back to business.
• Stunning 3D graphics and realistic photo finishes make Horse Racing Manager 2018 the best virtual horse racing simulation experience around!
• Move through a realistic and immersive calendar of races.


TRAIN:
• Set regiments to prepare your horse for major upcoming matches.
• Boost horse performance stats with food, rest and physical training.
• Maintain and upgrade stats through a variety of training methods or breed horses to create the strongest and fiercest of bloodlines.
• Exercise routines can vary in surface conditions, exertion levels and more.
• Only the best of the best racing horse owners know how to keep their horses in peak form, well rested and at an optimal weight.
• Need your horse to pack on a few pounds? Try treating it to a handful of sugar cubes!
• Unlock additional stable slots to bolster an even more impressive roster of horse racing stars.

CUSTOMIZE:
• Choose a unique look for your jockey and horse with an assortment options.
• Adjust the outfits, emblem and colors that suit your own personal taste.
• Bond with every horse in your stable by giving them individual names.
• Customize a nurturing environment for your horses to flourish!

BREED:
• Buy, sell and breed horses to participate competitions and create a powerhouse stable full of speedy candidates.
• Match two horses with favorable traits to inherit special attributes and stats.
• Rare breeds can be unlocked with special genetic traits such as zebra stripes or super speed.
• Be sure to breed carefully because unique skills can only be obtained through breeding and not trained.
• Participate in a slew of events that can affect special Breeding Rights.
• Stunning 3D visuals showcase an impressive variety of unique colors, patterns, and traits acquired through breeding.

Stop just watching the horse races and take part in the action. Saddle up cowboys, because the number one horse racing management sim is here! Can you be a world-class horse racing manager talked about from Kentucky to Epsom!? Become a horse racing legend now!

* PLEASE NOTE! Horse Racing Manager 2018 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.
Meet other players and find out more about Horse Racing Manager:
* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/horseracingmanager2018
* Twitter: @HRM_2018 (http://twitter.com/HRM_2018)
* Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimePRIVACY
* Terms of Service: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimeTOS

comments: It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. You should add more enemies for example:  child o' slenderina,  slenderman and the spiders.  3. You should add an Adventure mode.  Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ üòÉüëç

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

Who doesn't love this game? It's bone chilling and exciting for the whole family (Litterally my whole fam plays this game) it would be cool to have a mode where there was no granny just to explore the house and get a feel for how to escape. Also some weapons to attack granny. Lastly a map of where granny is would be super cool. Good luck!

Thus is the best thing since sliced bread! üòÇüòÇ Its the best horror app ive ever played.. It is so deep.. really deep. Ive found all the secrets in one day. And let me tell you, Granny has a serious problem with bear traps.. üòÇüòÇ Please keep up the good work! I beg you to nake more games like this! I LOVE GRANNY LOL  üòÜüòÇüòçüòó

This is an early game with a bunch of potential. I love the game and I'm always playing it but I feel like you can expand the game with these additions. Firstly, why not add in a collectible menu where you can hunt extremely hard-to-find collection of items within Granny's house. Also you could possibly add another, backdoor exit to the house. This would mean being able to escape a different way. Finally you could add another whole game mode where you escape the house in a different way. (You could even add in a whole new mechanic but don't make it too complex!)

This is definitely the best game I've downloaded! Can you please add some more weapon boxes all unlockable with one key? And put like guns and things in. Granny doesn't stay tranquilized long enough. BEST IDEA EVER!! Make it so there is a granny in the forest and go into another house with granny in.
description: Welcome to Granny.Granny keeps you locked in her house.Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.You have 5 days.Good luck!The game contains advertisement.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.
recentChanges: * Opportunity to get a bonus day (only Normal and Easy).
* An extra lock on the main door (Only Hard).
* Now you can drop items on beartraps to disarm them.
summary: Granny keeps you locked in her house.
title: Granny

comments: It's a good twist on the base building genre. Whether or not it'll keep me interested long term I don't know. We'll see if, at later stages, it can become like the others where you have to spend money or fail. For now it's very entertaining.

Sooo amazing! I've only been playing for 2 days and I'm on lvl 10 üòÇ I guess it'll be nice if there will be more Clan activities wherein all members can participate to avoid being bored while wiating for upgradea.  All in all,  I love this!

The game is the best addictive I have played so far ..the graphics perfect..gameplay simple flawless ,,you guys should add more modernized weapons and correct the bag where by the game freezez even when the network is Best.. Keep the gaming spirit burning
Great time killer. The packs are expensive for the bs you get. I spent over $2000 on GOW due to the decent packs, but theres no way I'd buy any mafia city packs.
I love the game but there's one problem... ever since yesterday when I try to play the game it just shows a black screen and I can't play.  Pls fix

comments: You need to make up your mind if you are using British English or US English. Seems Americans don't realize the past tense of 'spell' is either 'spelt' or 'spelled' in the US you don't often see it spelled 'spelt' (LOL) although both SPELT AND SPELLED ARE CORRECT. You do this with other words with US & UK spelling differences.  You forget both are correct. It was British English a thousand years before it was American English. Americans have been BUTCHERING English for about 300 years now.

Great Effort but can't give 5 star rating as the game only gives you very little time to check the spelling of many words. While it should have been like 15-20 seconds for checking each of the words spelling & then the next. 10 to 15 words can comprise each level and the words going to be harder as one goes up in the levels. This will be fun for sure. Other wise in current context folks will get disheartened sooner than expected and would cease to play it and that I suppose should be amended ASAP. Thank you.
It's great for spelling. There are a lot of misspelled words though. And also, way too many ads.
Hey @Daffy Duck! Maybe its you thats spelling things wrong. Spelt??? Shouldn't that be spelled?? Just saying....
This game is highly amusing and thoroughly addictive but more importantly a positive brain training exercise for individual or family use.  Impossible to become bored.. üëã

description: Test your spelling skills and challenge people from all around the world in our newest English spelling word game called Spelling Challenge! Are you good enough in spelling to be able to make it into TOP20 global highscores?Spelling Challenge is a new educational English spelling game that will check your spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game contains hundreds of misspelled English words, addicting and original gameplay, global leaderboards and a lot of other features that will improve your spelling skills in an original and enjoyable way! You will never fail in spelling test at school again! How to play: There will be shown a word on a screen and your task is to decide if the word is spelled correctly or not! You must answer correctly a number of words that equals to "TODO" number to be able to progress to the next level! Watch out, in each level you can make max 5 mistakes. Also watch out for level limit shown under the word. If you lose the level, you can play it again (max three times), then you must start over. Scoring: Your score depends on your speed and number of mistakes you make. There is also an overall score = total score from all games you ever played, so more times you play = better score you get!Features:* Educational and challenging English vocabulary spelling game not only for kids but for all ages* Thousands of most misspelled words included* Great way to improve your spelling skills, grammar and vocabulary knowledge* Global leaderboards included - submit your score and compare it with other people all around the world* Share your score with your friends via facebook, google+, WhatsApp, twitter and other social networks* Review your spelling progress and words in which you made mistakes* A must game for all the spelling bee game fans* Simple to play, no need to read instructions* 100% free full version + no In-App purchases* From a creator of 5+ popular spelling gamesHave fun and if you find any bug or if you have any idea to improve the game, please let us know! (If you enjoy the game, please leave a rating and some comment, it helps us a lot in adding new and mainly free features.)Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/Email: littlebigplay@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay
descriptionHTML:
Test your spelling skills and challenge people from all around the world in our newest English spelling word game called Spelling Challenge! Are you good enough in spelling to be able to make it into TOP20 global highscores?

Spelling Challenge is a new educational English spelling game that will check your spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game contains hundreds of misspelled English words, addicting and original gameplay, global leaderboards and a lot of other features that will improve your spelling skills in an original and enjoyable way! You will never fail in spelling test at school again!

How to play: There will be shown a word on a screen and your task is to decide if the word is spelled correctly or not! You must answer correctly a number of words that equals to "TODO" number to be able to progress to the next level! Watch out, in each level you can make max 5 mistakes. Also watch out for level limit shown under the word. If you lose the level, you can play it again (max three times), then you must start over.

Scoring: Your score depends on your speed and number of mistakes you make. There is also an overall score = total score from all games you ever played, so more times you play = better score you get!

Features:
* Educational and challenging English vocabulary spelling game not only for kids but for all ages
* Thousands of most misspelled words included
* Great way to improve your spelling skills, grammar and vocabulary knowledge
* Global leaderboards included - submit your score and compare it with other people all around the world
* Share your score with your friends via facebook, google+, WhatsApp, twitter and other social networks
* Review your spelling progress and words in which you made mistakes
* A must game for all the spelling bee game fans
* Simple to play, no need to read instructions
* 100% free full version + no In-App purchases
* From a creator of 5+ popular spelling games

Have fun and if you find any bug or if you have any idea to improve the game, please let us know!

(If you enjoy the game, please leave a rating and some comment, it helps us a lot in adding new and mainly free features.)

Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/
Email: littlebigplay@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay

comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

This game is for people who want to spend literally ¬£1000's otherwise your just being constantly attacked, wiped out and then you have to spend weeks/months trying to get back to where you were or maybe a little further. They should make it a little more equal for all. Shame really as the game itself has so much promise.

I enjoy the game a lot. It is pay to win in every sense of the word though. My problem is customer service is the worst. Takes 5 or 6 days to respond to help requests if they do at all. Good game, worst customer service possible.

I overall enjoy the game.  I did the tavern and did a volley for rewards. It showed I won one thing and it gave me another. I took a screen shot of it, sent it to customer service to be compensated.  They say, sorry it was a display error you got the correct rewards. Ummm, no I didn't! It showed I won a valor stone and they gave me a champion stone.  I even had the screen shots to prove it!!  Very unhappy with it and the customer service.  It's not my fault the game glitched, and I should be compensated with what it showed I won. It is NOT my fault the game had a display error.  I have spent money on this game ( more than I will admit) but after the way this was handled,  I will not spend another dime.  Although they probably don't care, as they have shown me already, it is just very disappointing. The way they treat the folks that put the money in their pockets....

I maintain my stance that this game is pay to win. Peaceful, nonpaying lords are punished harshly by higher level lords that just teleport next to you and raid your city until you have nothing left. This problem has been made even worse with the killing event. It lasts 4 whole days and invites so much violence and destruction that small peaceful cities are completely set back to square one by larger more powerful lords. I appreciated the hours I spent into this game, but I cannot support what the developers are doing at this time.
Addictive strategy game but again if you want to be strong you have to spend a fortune otherwise you would be crushed. Some roomers about cheating codes I heard from other players.

Great time passer except when you have to get some sleep and you have to do just one more level...me right now! Forced myself to quit. So far not a press for time which is nice. So many match three puts a time limit. So far I see 900 available levels so I'm not sure if time is a factor yet. I hope not. I play to relax. Not get stressed by a clock ticking down on me. They offer coins so you really don't need to purchase if you don't want to. Relaxing and challenging at the same time. Good game to get.

I have really been enjoying playing this game. Some of the levels I've been flying through. I like that you don't have to wait 24 hours if you decide not to purchase anything. But now I am stuck on level 184 and I have no clue how to get out of it. I did have a couple of levels where I saw a pop-up that said I'm now a tester. After that I was able to move the flowers anyway I wanted. I wish I had that now because a few more tries and I'm going to uninstall this game.

You don't have to wait for lives to refill which is the biggest upside.  Ads always seem to come up after your out of moves for the level but before you click okay to move to the next level (so I have lost my progress on a level before). Strategic game play that's good for passing the time but keeping your mind engaged.

Updating for the 3rd time. Love the music but going to uninstall bc of level 652. Wish the sorry, meant Winter not Harvest blitz had the same background music, but ... Oh well. I'll find another developer.  Wth is up with level 652!? This is impossible!!!!! Graphics could be a tad bit better, but overall it's ok. I like not having to wait for lives in order to continue to play, sweet! The ads aren't so bad, just click back as began & it's all good. description: Mountain Assault Shooting ArenaReload Your Assault Gun, More Enemy Army Troopers are Coming.Welcome to a brand new shooting game of 2018. The enemy has swarmed in the jungle and are conducting offensive strikes against our country. The armed forces cannot engage with any full fledge frontline pvp battle. Because this could rage war between two countries. But this thing need to be tackled within no time to stop cover strike commando. The enemy has also build up hideouts and are attacking from behind. Now the strategic reply should be given from our side by our commando. For this, the high command has hired a commando to crush the enemy forces. You have to play the character of war strike commando. Your ultimate duty is to retaliate the enemy attack. The jungle is very dense with a lot of cover, so war strike commando needs to be very careful.The gameplay of this game is very thrilling. Players of every age will definitely enjoy with dozens of sequenced frontline pvp battle levels. The initial missions are very easy as compared to last ones. Because the difficulty level increases as you proceed more inside the war strike commando game. You are the only best man to conduct operation in a jungle swarming with hostile forces. There are different weapons in the armory that you can use in cover strike commando game. But only primary gun is available and you have to buy other stuff. The mission tasks are different in each mission of this covert ops commando game. This will definitely test your shooting skills to a whole new level. Furthermore, the gadget includes mini radar to show your position on the ground in this covert ops commando game. You will also get paid with cash on completing each mission. Spend it to buy new weapons, med packs and grenades to win cover strike commando game. You should be prepared every moment, because the enemy is battle hardened and well trained.The controls of this frontline pvp battle game are very easy. Even players of every age will enjoy their spare time with fun. The button placement is ideal in this war strike commando game. You have one section for movement and other to perform actions. The action buttons include fire, reload, change stance and miscellaneous to provide ease of playing this commando pvp shooting game. You can also have a strategic look via radar showing enemy positions. So paly more and enhance your experience in commando pvp shooting games.Best of Luck‚Ä¶! descriptionHTML:
Prepare for epic versus-fighting action with your favorite Marvel Super Heroes & Super Villains in the ultimate cosmic showdown! Spider-Man, Iron Man, Wolverine & more await your summons to battle! Assemble a team & begin your quest to become the Ultimate Marvel Champion!

WELCOME TO THE CONTEST:
Captain America vs. Iron Man! Hulk vs. Wolverine! Spider-Man vs. Deadpool! The greatest battles in Marvel history are in your hands! The greedy Elder of the Universe known as The Collector has summoned you to a brawl of epic proportions against a line-up of vile villains including Thanos, Kang the Conqueror, and many more! Experience the ultimate free-to-play fighting game on your mobile device…Marvel Contest of Champions!

SUIT UP WITH FRIENDS:
• Team up with your friends and other Summoners to build the strongest Alliance
• Strategize with your alliance, help them keep their Champions in the fight
• Battle to the top in Alliance Events and take on Alliance Quest Series together in specially designed quest maps to earn exclusive Alliance rewards
• Test your Alliance’s mettle by battling it out with Alliances from around the world in Alliance Wars!

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM OF CHAMPIONS:
• Assemble a mighty team of heroes and villains (choosing Champions such as: Iron Man, Hulk, Wolverine, Storm, Star-Lord, Gamora, Spider-Man, Deadpool, Magneto and Winter Soldier)
• Embark on quests to defeat Kang and Thanos and face the challenge of a mysterious new super powerful cosmic competitor, ultimately to prevent the total destruction of The Marvel Universe
• Improve your team’s offense and defense with multiple Mastery trees

COLLECT THE MIGHTIEST SUPER HEROES (AND VILLAINS!):
• Collect, level up, and manage your teams of heroes and villains wisely to receive synergy bonuses based upon team affiliation and relationships taken from the pages of Marvel Comics
• Pairing up Black Panther and Storm or Cyclops and Wolverine for bonuses, or making a team of Guardians of the Galaxy for a team affiliation bonus
• The more powerful the Champion, the better their stats, abilities and special moves will be
• New Champions are being added to The Contest all the time!

QUEST AND BATTLE:
• Journey through an exciting storyline in classic Marvel storytelling fashion
• Fight it out with a huge array of heroes and villains in iconic locations spanning the Marvel Universe such as: Avengers Tower, Oscorp, The Kyln, Wakanda, The Savage Land, Asgard, the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier, and more!
• Explore dynamic quest maps and engage in a healthy dose of action-packed fighting utilizing controls developed specifically for the mobile platform

Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MarvelContestofChampions
Subscribe on YouTube: www.youtube.com/MarvelChampions
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/MarvelChampions
Follow us on Instagram: www.instagram.com/marvelchampions
www.playcontestofchampions.com

comments: Amazing! This game has a very easy to understand control layout and amazing models, textures and just straight up beautiful. I only have one problem, I think the air controls are a bit too sticky and floaty. You think you're going to land on the platform, but you miss it because your character keeps on going when you let go. Otherwise, great games. Keep making great games!

It's pretty and simple, I'm just trying to figure out how to get better at perfect landings Edit: after a long haitus, I'm amazed at how much smoother everything is...I miss my monkey Kong though... I don't mind unlocking everyone I had before, because this game is relaxing. The added flip animation is a great touch.

The game started out with glitches that I was okay with: 1. Sometimes I  hit jump, it says precise jump, my character makes the sound of a jump, but instead I fall. 2. Sometimes, the game will freeze for a split second causing me to either hit a wall, or miss a platform. If this is an update, they just created a much worse problem. If I get a treasure chest, I have to watch a video to open it or pay money. I watched a video, then the option came to pay money and I don't want to. Unfortunately, there is now no way to continue playing the game, period, because it locks up. I have to close it out and restart.

Very nice game, great graphics, simple and accurate controls. Oh yeah and I love the atmospheric music. The game is also great for improving your concentration and reflexes.  The only thing that bothers me is that there is no option to buy once to unlock all the new words..

I really enjoyed this game... Until it came to starting it on a new device. Seriously! All my progress reset to a random time where I first started the game, on top of that, it wouldn't even restore my purchases or characters or anything! You can make a great game but it's stealing. Seriously, and ads to open a chest you collect? That jus crashes the app. No thanks

Latest update performs well but UI is increasingly busy and I don't like the new system encouraging you to keep buying coin magnets. It would help people struggling with the controls if the game made it clear you can slow down by tapping the opposite direction

descriptionHTML:
It's time to hang around the beach and blast the coconuts with colorful bubbles to get your favorite boo - Beach Pop is next ultimate bubble shooting saga!

It's time to match three and more bubbles to pop them for bubble bursting madness.

Join Tim as boy to impress his girl-friend Kim while Jim is trying to impress Sim with different animations and skills. They are also trying to stop the evil Nahbah to harm their girls but Pooga, Booga and Yooga are very naughty.

Connect to Facebook and discover thrilling destinations with your friends like Misty Mountains, Cursed Beach, Tribal Town, Lava of Doom and many more. With more than 2000 (and more added every month) bubble bursting levels in the game, we’ll make sure your journey doesn’t end too soon!

comments: I love this game! If you like chess and like to think you'll like this game no doubt! There are some ads but not so much that it makes me want to turn off my Wi-Fi. It has cute graphics and runs smooth. I just cant get enough. As far as scary no not scary a little like whoa they're gunna hit.. Oh wait phew how did they not hit? RGB keep up the good work with this game and all your other free stuff! You guys make great games for all ages!

Im not normally one for puzzle games but This game is great and addictive, haven't played a game quite like it. This game was done so well from the gameplay to graphics to controls, it is a really fluid experience and a great puzzle game, the new mechanics were introduced perfectly as I progressed and there was never a puzzle too easy or hard the level of difficulty increases and a good rate! Way To Go guys

This is a phenomenal puzzle game. It provides you with an incredibly simple concept that eases the player into the game's mechanics and turns into some very devious puzzles later on. The ads are a bit intrusive, being the ones you could accidentally tap on trying to remove with larger hands (like mine), and unskippable video ads that reward you with in-game currency needed to unlock levels, but those are never necessary, and for less than 2 dollars you can remove them outright. All in all, this is a charming and brain-teasing puzzle game that's well worth your time.

The first levels are okay but after that there's a huge difficulty gap, got really frustrating. Controls are really bad. How I'm supposed to know where I'm taking the truck if my finger is on top of it?

I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

I like it! Certain levels were so challenging to beat in Expert Mode I thought it was impossible. But with some patience you can solve it! (With the exception of Houston U-4 how do you beat that in 46 moves lol)

descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.

This is how you do it:
1) Draw routes for your truck drivers. Make sure that every house receives the correct package.
2) Press play.
3) Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!

Features:
* 400 FREE levels
* Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
* Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
* Beautiful graphics
* Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!

★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★

Available In-App purchases:

KING TRUCK
* The premium version of RGB Express
* Removes ads
* Supports game development and future updates

HINTS
* The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
* Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
* TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
recentChanges: - A new challenge: Mirror mode! Another perspective to solve the puzzles  [Complete 100 levels to unlock mirror mode]
- Expert Mode par values are now tougher on some levels!  [Complete 200 levels to unlock Expert Mode]
- Improved tutorials to help new players
summary: Easy to learn puzzle game with a serious challenge for puzzle game fans!
title: RGB Express

descriptionHTML:
The tranquil garden was suddenly upset by the invaders outside. They dragged crowdedly and destroyed everything along the way. The fruit is extremely angry because it is suddenly conquered. Trees will have to stand up to fight the enemy. In order to be victorious, you need to map out the right tactics to sort the plants that confront the beast. During the fight, do not forget to plant the sun flower to get more energy.

Game features:
- 15 different plants.
- 100 levels.
- Save score.
- Smooth graphics, lively sound.

Wish you happy and enjoy the game!

description: Transport passengers from a city to another city terminal through amazing places and landscapes.Follow traffic rules, transport passengers, telolet for children, and don't be afraid to travel farther because you will earn more money.Customize your bus with varieties of liveries, horns, telolets, bumpers, velgs, and many more!Make your bus the center of attention by installing a STROBE Light!Realistic places, Detailed bus vehicles, wonderful interiors will make you feel like driving a real bus!Get Mobile Bus Simulator now!Features:- Realistic Maps- Detailed Buses (super high decker, double-decker, and more to come.)- Bus STROBE Lights- Realistic Bus driving experience- Bus customization with varieties of liveries, horns, telolets, bumpers, and velgs to choose from.- Open/Close door button- Animated people entering/exiting the bus- Weather conditions (sunny and rain full of thunder) and day night cycle- Steering Wheel, Buttons or Tilt controls- Various camera angles (cabin cam, outer cam, free moving cam)- Detailed bus interiors- Intelligent AI and Traffic System- Tons of AI vehicles variations (sedan, buses, Tahu Bulat, truck cabe / Stut Jack, box, police car, oil tank truck, and many more.)- Realistic traffic rules- Realistic bus sound effects- Realistic bus horn and TELOLET sound effects- Achievements and Leaderboards- Challenge your friends with online rankingsTIPS- Choose the appropriate graphics settings with your phone's ability to play the game smoothly.- Choose how to control your bus for easy driving on the settings menu.- Turn on the light at the night so you can avoid accidents.- When your bus ran out of gas, you can buy gas on offer or at the nearest gas station.- If you follow traffic rules, transport many passengers, telolet for the children, travel far during the game, you will earn more more money.We always try to bring you the best game ever, so we need you feedback. Don't forget to rate our Mobile Bus Simulator and leave a review. Because it means a lotENJOY & Thank You!
descriptionHTML:
Transport passengers from a city to another city terminal through amazing places and landscapes.
Follow traffic rules, transport passengers, telolet for children, and don't be afraid to travel farther because you will earn more money.
Customize your bus with varieties of liveries, horns, telolets, bumpers, velgs, and many more!
Make your bus the center of attention by installing a STROBE Light!
Realistic places, Detailed bus vehicles, wonderful interiors will make you feel like driving a real bus!
Get Mobile Bus Simulator now!


Features:
- Realistic Maps
- Detailed Buses (super high decker, double-decker, and more to come.)
- Bus STROBE Lights
- Realistic Bus driving experience
- Bus customization with varieties of liveries, horns, telolets, bumpers, and velgs to choose from.
- Open/Close door button
- Animated people entering/exiting the bus
- Weather conditions (sunny and rain full of thunder) and day night cycle
- Steering Wheel, Buttons or Tilt controls
- Various camera angles (cabin cam, outer cam, free moving cam)
- Detailed bus interiors
- Intelligent AI and Traffic System
- Tons of AI vehicles variations (sedan, buses, Tahu Bulat, truck cabe / Stut Jack, box, police car, oil tank truck, and many more.)
- Realistic traffic rules
- Realistic bus sound effects
- Realistic bus horn and TELOLET sound effects
- Achievements and Leaderboards
- Challenge your friends with online rankings


TIPS
- Choose the appropriate graphics settings with your phone's ability to play the game smoothly.
- Choose how to control your bus for easy driving on the settings menu.
- Turn on the light at the night so you can avoid accidents.
- When your bus ran out of gas, you can buy gas on offer or at the nearest gas station.
- If you follow traffic rules, transport many passengers, telolet for the children, travel far during the game, you will earn more more money.


We always try to bring you the best game ever, so we need you feedback. Don't forget to rate our Mobile Bus Simulator and leave a review. Because it means a lot

ENJOY & Thank You!
summary: Mobile Bus Simulator is the game that will let you become a real Bus Driver!
title: Mobile Bus Simulator

description: Super Contra Classic 1988 is a Classic Video Game was in PC since 1988, now it is available for Mobile.Super Contra Classic 1988 is combined by platformer game type and 2d shooter game type.Super Contra Classic 1988 have classic pixel graphics, classic gameplay and classic characters.Gameplay in Super Contra Classic 1988 is very simple, you just use 2 move buttons, fire button and jump button to control your hero to kill all enemies. At the end each map, you will encourage a boss, you need to kill the boss to pass map.
descriptionHTML:
Super Contra Classic 1988 is a Classic Video Game was in PC since 1988, now it is available for Mobile.
Super Contra Classic 1988 is combined by platformer game type and 2d shooter game type.
Super Contra Classic 1988 have classic pixel graphics, classic gameplay and classic characters.
Gameplay in Super Contra Classic 1988 is very simple, you just use 2 move buttons, fire button and jump button to control your hero to kill all enemies. At the end each map, you will encourage a boss, you need to kill the boss to pass map.
summary: Super Contra Classic 1988 - Contra Classic Video Game Come Back
title: Super Contra Classic 1988

comments: Good game to pass your time. Upgrade costs and parts spawn rates are reasonable if you only use a few vehicles because it will take a long to yo max out everything. I think it will be better if league vs trophies distribution are reworked because its very easy yo reach legends. should give a higher win bonus at higher trophies i think to make it more competitive. And lastly, hackers should be deleted from leaderbord.. there are a few impossible timings on the board.

I enjoy the game greatly. It's slightly different with  the chest and stuff but it is sure nice to get bonuses every now and than. There are new adds though which I'm not super stoked about like the brake time adds but they keep them short and can be skipped quick if you have already watched them. All and all great game

I love this game. Every game I've had, I played for a week or so, and uninstalled. But this one? Ive had for almost 6 months. Been playing every single day. Finally reached legendary 32, I've unlocked everything. I love the VIP subscription and upgrades it gives you. I would like atleast one new vehicle option every month or so. Or at least a new adventure spot. Making a modded version of the rally car would be fantastic. Also, an upgrade on the formula car where it doesn't almost dead stop after it lands from a big air.

Superb game! Too bad, the elements of hate like to hack good things and cause frustrations. For this reason, constantly run constant updates. I wouldn't mind paying through my rather expensive data to diffuse the damage by these bored, small prick nincompoops! Africaüòùüòùüòù

Well done with stealing the boxes idea from clash royale wow you didn't even Change the opening times, I think the next thing you should do is offering legendary and epic chests with legendary and epic cars. I have loved the first part of this game it was funny and doesn't make any pressure on you, the second one should be blocked from play store, shame on you..

If you don't want to give away free stuff from the chests, don't. But stop wasting my damn giving me these "free" coins for watching a video only to have the ad freeze %95 of the time. The are plenty of other free games out there, might be time for a change.

descriptionHTML:
The sequel to the legendary game that captured the hearts and minds of over 100 million players is here!

Warning: Paradise Island 2 is highly addictive even if you’ve never played this kind of game before.

"Paradise Island 2" is a game for everyone who loves the sun, the sea, and the sand!

Tear yourself away from work and build your own resort on a sunny island and become the ultimate hotel mogul!

Don’t you think it’s time to start your own business? Wealthy tourists are already flocking to your sunny shores! Entertain them in casinos and entertainment centers, build hotels, restaurants and stores, and provide plenty of amusements! Build your own empire of entertainment! Turn your island into the best resort empire and learn to manage your own business.


Key features:

✔ Build over 300 buildings drawn in a unique style.

✔ Improve and develop your island, invite and entertain guests, and earn huge profits!

✔ Help and feed animals in danger, build your city in tune with nature.

✔ Save an adorable leopard cub and get a loyal pet in return.

✔ Assemble a collection of unique animals and natural phenomena.

✔ Find all the hidden ancient treasures.

✔ Play fascinating mini-games (arcades, platformers, puzzles, pairs, PvP, PvE and more) with daily rankings of the best players and their achievements.

✔ Complete ambitious projects: find and rebuild ancient pyramids, abandoned farms, and world wonders!

✔ Take part in competitions against friends and other city managers for the best places in the game rankings.

✔ Win in fun PvP fights called Beach Battles.

✔ Play in offline mode. Enjoy it on a plane, on the subway, or on the road!

✔ Play with your friends: visit friends’ islands to find hidden objects and receive gifts!

✔ Unique events with special game mechanics and lots of amazing quests.


Build your own tourist city with luxury hotels, receive guests and complete exciting tasks. Paradise is within reach! Take the reins of power and show the world that you can be a successful magnate!

The long-awaited sequel to one of the best economic city-builder simulation games!


"Paradise Island 2" Facebook community: https://www.facebook.com/ParadiseIsland2/

Official page of "Paradise Island 2" simulation game http://www.game-insight.com/en/games/paradise-island-2

comments: Ive been playing for the better part of a year, and this game started out great for a long while. But IGG not only panders and gives better deals to Chinese people, cheaper packs etc. But literally 99% of all mega guilds and players are Chinese or Vietnamese. If your not asain don't play this game  you'll end up like me playing forever just to quit because of the obvious discrimination IGG holds with its playerbase

Not a good game for new players.  Was fun and  interesting at first but you qucikly realise that you are just food for high level players with no way to reach a defensible level.  High level players basically teleport in, raid everyone and teleport out.  They should lock servers to keep it balanced and give more guidance for new players. This game is  clearly weighted towards the people who have been playing it the longest. Dont waste your time

Kingdom 249 is open before just 50 days back. And one guild have 2B might. Most of the guys have millions of might one of them got 700M might. How's this is possible. Kingdom 277 is opened before 15 days back but one guild K03 got more powerful. Top guys got 120M might in just 15 days. Does IGG employees playing this game. We are lover of this game please don't lose your credibility. This two kingdom which I observed only Chinese players are strong. How overall kingdom only Chinese players got higher might in less time.

This game is fun but be prepared for the mother of all Pay2win games.  These folks at IGG are experts at crafting new and exciting ways at fleecing their customers of every cent they can.  You CANNOT compete if u dont pay and pay often.  Players here ...just regular people... dump hundreds of rl $$$ regularly.  You have been warned.

Do NOT go for high level military research without searching monster hunting, and Do NOT go for T4 if you not going to spent thousands of dollars. Even if you don't mind to wait 200 days, you will not able to afford it (lvl 10 military Def, Atk, Health cost 100m gold each). DO NOT GO FOR HIGH MILITARY AND T4 WITHOUT FULLY UNDERSTANDING THE GAME.

Gameplay is good, not a lot to complain about. As far as purchasing via in-app, BE CAUTIOUS AS THEY HAVE LITTLE TO NO CARE ABOUT THE QUALITY OR THE QUANTITY OF THE SUPPLIES YOU PURCHASE FROM WHAT WAS ADVERTISED TO YOU. YOU WILL NOT SEE REIMBURSEMENT.

comments: This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

I like the game, and it's addictive, but the mechanics are absolutely flawed. There have been tons of instances where the game has unfairly screwed me or other player's over. 1. Places mystery boxes in front of the player who drives second, but not the first player. 2. Hills like to stop a ball, that is being shot full force by an iron club, in it's tracks. 3. The swinging spike balls only affect some players golf balls, but not others.  Things like this piss people off, because they expect the game to be fair. Those small things easily aid a player in losing a match.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

Fun game. But you definitely have things to fix. Like the fact that sometimes when you win, you still lose. And I'm not talking about having less gems. I'm talking  when the other player doesn't even in the hole. Definitely a glitch. Also, as far as controls....easy enough. But sometimes while I'm in the middle of a backswing, the ball will shoot on it's own without me releasing it. Which sucks because it's a wasted shot and usually costs you the match. Aside from those two irritating problems, it really is a fun game. I will continue to play, hoping you fix the issues.

Game cheats, puts you against lower lol players with better equipment who make ungodly shots, or much higher level where you don't have a chance. I hit things that aren't there, and with a crossword my ball will fly into the wind with no action. Opponent Always get better wind and direction, and will outshoot you work lower equipmeny.

I love the game I find it very entertaining. I also like being able to interact globally. But the only one thing that I would change, would be to make the analog where you pull back your driver smaller screened devices. Besides that I have no complaints. I love the game! üòäüòä
description: Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!‚òÖ‚òÖ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ‚òÖ‚òÖKEY FEATURES - Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer. - Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike! - Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies! - Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun. - Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves! - Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top. - Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus. - Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion! - Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge! - Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts! - Play online matches with your family and friends!* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news! https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/* You need an internet connection to play this game.* Optional Permissions - Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.  - Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.  - Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches* How to turn permissions on or off - Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off. - Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. descriptionHTML:
Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!
Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!

Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!

Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!

Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!

So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!

★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★

KEY FEATURES
- Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer.
- Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike!
- Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies!
- Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun.
- Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves!
- Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top.
- Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus.
- Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion!
- Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge!
- Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts!
- Play online matches with your family and friends!

* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news!
https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/

* You need an internet connection to play this game.

* Optional Permissions
- Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.
- Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.
- Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches

* How to turn permissions on or off
- Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off.
- Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. Otherwise you may uninstall "Mini Golf King" app to revoke them as a whole.

descriptionHTML:
Play the latest, most EXCITING tuk tuk driving simulator game on the Play Store. Tuk Tuk Driving Simulator 2018 will give you a REALISTIC Tuk Tuk driving experience.
Detailed tuk tuk, realistic interiors and the beautiful open world city environment will make you feel like you are driving a real tuk tuk!

Drive carefully to the pick-up spot, let the passengers board the tuk tuk and then drop them to their destination. 
Use the GPS based direction maps as your guide to help you reach your destination. Find the best route possible and save precious time! Enjoy easy controls and smooth game play while cruising through the city and off roads.

Drive carefully because every time you crash into traffic your tuk tuk will get damaged and the passengers will be hurt! Make sure you drop your passengers before your tuk tuk is completely broken and damaged!
Tuk Tuk Driving Simulator 2018 is all about your tuk tuk driving skills in the beautiful city!

Tuk Tuk Driving Simulator 2018 is an exciting, action packed tuk tuk driving simulator game. Each level of Tuk Tuk Driving Simulator 2018 is more CHALLENGING and more exciting than the previous one! Your passengers are waiting for you! 

Get behind the wheel of the tuk tuk and drive around the big open world city to complete all the routes!
Pick and drop passengers, make money and purchase new tuk tuk that are more powerful and full of awesome features.

Tuk Tuk Driving Simulator 2018 FEATURES
- Real life traffic 
- Beautiful city environment
- Challenging missions
- Different grand tuk tuk to drive
- Realistic tuk tuk physics
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic tuk tuk interiors
- Realistic game sound effects
- Easy controls to drive the tuk tuk
- Fresh attractive music

Explore the beautiful city in your tuk tuk and become the king of the road! Get Tuk Tuk Driving Simulator 2018 now!

For any suggestions or bugs. Please write to support@appsoleutcoders.com
summary: Drive a Tuk Tuk in the city!
title: Tuk Tuk Driving Simulator 2018

Get ready to break some bones or get your bones crushed by ruthless fighters from the whole world. Fight your way to the top and beat every player in this tournament one after another. Perform flawless combos hits and hit your enemy while he‚Äôs in midair and vulnerable. descriptionHTML:
Have you ever thought of being menacing prehistoric sea monster & rule the ocean?

Sea Dragon Simulator is here to give you that experience. Play as treacherous predator of the ocean. You are a giant big beast with insatiable appetite who can hunt & eat everything that comes in his way. Attack boats, ships, and ski jets to feed your monster. This brute can feel & smell the prey near it. Use your charge attack to break the underwater mirror tunnels, grab people & rip them apart. Use your sharp jaws to create havoc before they breakout.

Watch out! You have to use your combo power to save yourself from other sea monsters, they will attack you, injure you & kill you. This is real underwater rampage adventure & sea environment experience! Complete your hunt & fulfill your hunger as fast as you can before you get hunted. Show no mercy, Chase your prey, attack and grab it in the sharp jaws to kill instantly.

So, Its time to feed your monster!

Sea Dragon Simulator Features:
• Realistic underwater sea experience
• 3D graphics, ocean & beach environment
• Thrilling hunting experience with sea dragon monster
• Variety of missions with graduating difficulty.
• Smooth & intuitive controls
• Easy & fun to play
summary: Get ready to feel the rage of Sea Dragon!
title: Sea Dragon Simulator

comments: A giant mess of people who pay a ton of money to prey on anyone with impunity. Absolutely no rules regarding who or how often you can attack someone significantly lower in level. Even if you are stupid enough to pour money into this garbage, you will get your butt handed to you by someone else.

This is for the makers of this game you need to introduce rules so that players who either work for the makers or spend 100's to become strong very quickly... cannot destroy the enjoyment of the game for those of us who would like to grow in the game and play the game properly to become strong through perseverance and hard work... the cash rich players are ruining this game for everyone...

Has alot to keep you busy. For that i give 5 stars. Minus 1 star because certain features in the game cannot be unlocked unless you spend money. To me thats a recipe for a slow death. For i will soon be leaving guns of glory in a blaze of glory based on that alone.

I love the game, it's great and always looking forward to playing it, and lately it's been freezing and exiting me out of the game every couple of minutes. So it's kind of hard to enjoy this great game. Also I don't know if there's a way to develope another estate but I think that would be beneficial to the game and pretty cool.

You guys really need to do some balancing. It's ridiculous that a level 22 guy can just annihilate me when I'm level 10. Its pretty blatant that you're trying to force us to pay to play. You should make it to where you can only attack X levels below you and the further down you go, the less loot/xp you get, if you attack even or higher you get bonus loot/xp. Good game but needs rebalancing asap or your game will slowly die.

This a pay to win game with lootboxes of different packs. They will keep making you spend with micro transaction of useless stuff to get the real thing you seek. Once, they took my money and the item was not delivered to me because i asked refund before, for a pack called "hope gemstones pack" but after 3 times of 20 bucks purchases, i did not get a single hope gemstone. A scam game in a very good way to steal your money. On the other hand, the game is very addictive and well made. If only the developer has a bit of decency..

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for the next stage of warfare with the free strategy MMO Guns of Glory! GoG’s thrilling multiplayer RTS gameplay lets you raise your own powerful army to shoot down enemies and team up with friends from around the globe.

In Guns of Glory, you take the lead as a rising Lord in a Kingdom thrown into war! To become supreme ruler and seize the Crown of Destiny from the devious Cardinal, you’ll ally with the famous Three Musketeers, slay ferocious beasts, build your own magnificent Castle, engineer an unstoppable Airship, rally with friends to destroy enemies, and more!

FEATURES:

Strategy Warfare! Train an army of loyal Musketeers, manage your resources, construct devious traps and raid your enemies into oblivion, all in order to claim the crown and turn your Alliance into an unbeatable empire!

Powerful Airships! In an era of emerging progress and science, shoot down enemies and lead the attack with deadly advanced aircraft for a new level of RTS warfare. How will you customize your own flying warship?

World War! Seamless chat translation features make GoG’s multiplayer RTS and RPG gameplay richer than ever before – making friends from anywhere in the world has never been so simple.

Immersive MMO World! Guns of Glory brings the world of the Three Musketeers to life like you’ve never seen it before! Gorgeously rendered HD graphics and vivid, beautiful landscapes make all the action in this free strategy MMORPG spring to life!

Advanced RTS Combat! Set your own strategy to attack enemies and aid allies! Guns of Glory’s strategy MMORPG gameplay lets you customize your Airship, Estate, troops, buildings, equipment and more. Develop a game strategy to fit your own style in GoG and claim victory!

Empire Building! Construct a glorious fortified Estate, master a range of devastating skills and arm yourself with indestructible weapons to ensure your survival and success in this world of multiplayer strategy war!

comments: I started this game when it first came out. There were hardly any game advantages and everyone was having fun and on the same playing field. As more and more packages got released into the game it became a pay to win situation. I personally do not think spending $100+ on a phone game is a wise investment. Thus I enjoyed the game by taking advantage of their events and the prizes within the game. However, it has become dominated by people who payed to be the big guy and the little people get absolutely demolished. It has taken the fun out of playing, which really dissapoints me as it was a fun game to play.

This game has potential to be fun but it's completely ruined because IT'S COMPLETELY PAY-TO-WIN which sucked the fun out of the game that I quit. Don't get me wrong, Final Fantasy is highly respected RPG franchise because it's full of great games in the series. But no this one.  However, I might come back if the game developers make it not as pay-to-win as it is now. Right now, it's a complete money bucket!

This game is great and fun, I love spending my time playing this game. One problem though, what is going on with the packages? Why is it every time a package is bought all the packages go from 20 to 100 dollars ? We should be able to buy the 20 dollar packages more than once! Is that fixable? Please cuz i do want to keep playing but 100 dollars is too much.

The game is very addictive and fun to play. Some of the people playing the game are wonderful and fun to game with. Graphics are very good for a on line game played on phone, tablet or computer. The quests are challenging at best. BUT!!! BE WARNED... This game is not for young children as there is explicit language and cut throat people playing the game. After all it is a war game and nothing more. Now down to the nitty-gritty of the game. Yes it's free, but that only get you so far before you will need to buy packs in the game to advance and unlock the two new characters. The game quests are designed for people to spend if you want to get ahead fast. Large amounts of  $$$$$$ Cash are needed to play this game. $$$$$$ Personal note, I know people who have spent thousands on this game. Over all the game is great for young adults on up. PG-15

I absolutely LOVE my guild!!! Everyone is so cool,from all over the States & all over the world...have friends in other guilds as well from all over the world...my guild is like my "family"...some of us have even talked about meeting up with each other...I hope to finally meet some of my favorite people,especially our guild leader...we're like the best of friends!!! Although,he lives in TX & I'm from Michigan,we're both married ,but there's nothing I wouldn't do for him!!! Thanks so much for giving me this opportunity to meet such wonderful people!! Lifelong friends/family!!! üíú

descriptionHTML:
World War 1945

World War 1945 is an exciting, new foray into the field of mobile war games. Airborne operations, landing operations, tanks and munitions, battleships and carriers, air strikes and bombardments... utilize every single WWII element to devise your own strategies.
Pave the way to defeat the evil warmonger Pathos and compete with other players by using numerous arms and warship skills.

Note: World War 1945 is free to download and play, but some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please turn on authentication for purchases in the Google Play Store app.

Features:
-Build and upgrade various military facilities to gain access to new troops and weaponry.
-Experience famous WWII battlefields in Story Mode and claim various rewards.
-Feast your eyes upon vivid, dynamic graphics of the battlefields, soldiers, and weapons of WWII.
-Deploy historic tanks and armored vehicles of WWII to the battlefield including the Tiger and M4 Sherman.
-Construct 10+ types of warships including battleships, cruisers, destroyers, and aircraft carriers at the Navy Base.
-Install warship skills to large warships like the Missouri and Bismarck and legendary carriers like the Enterprise and Graf Zeppelin to enable fleet support abilities.
-Drop famed paratroopers like the Airborne Rangers and Fallschirmjäger to the enemy base and launch assaults from behind.
-Fortify your base with Sentry Towers and Bunkers; barricade it by planting Howitzers or even UHF Guns to protect your resources from other players.
-Modify and renew your defense facilities by giving them different weapons.
-Battle with other players and defeat them to join the higher league and earn greater rewards.

Join World War 1945, the one and only realistic WWII mobile game today. Train your troops, vanquish vicious enemies, and become the best commander in history.


Join World War 1945, Train your troops, vanquish vicious enemies, and become the best commander in history.

Travel across the world and spread the Food Truck craze, something a restaurant could never let you do! Use various ingredients to cook lots of amazing recipes of delicious dishes and desserts like Coffee, Pizza, Sandwich, Cake, BBQ, Burger, French Fries etc…

descriptionHTML:
Built on Unity 3D, Fantasy Blade displays a great Open World of Myth. Choose your favorite champion, start you adventurous journey, meet your side by side friends and create a new history. As a hot-blooded MMORPG mobile game, this grand and legendary game has all sorts of fierce PVP and PVE fighting. Weapons have no limitation for a specific class. Hundreds of weapons including Axe, Dual Blade, Bow and Fists can be switched immediately as per your need.

[Features]

- Grand Open World, Perfected for Mobile –
Fantasy Blade is in a leading place in MMORPG, with detailed characters, fluid animations, large-scale maps and wonderful buildings. The brilliant 3D graphics and special effects put you right in the middle of the battle.

- Advanced Weapon Switching Design –
Unlike other games, Fantasy Blade has no limitation of class and weapon. As per your satisfaction and requirement, you can use any weapons you like.

- Join Your Friends in Fierce Team Battles –
Call up your powerful allies into a battle. Interact with friends and set special tactic against your opponents. Team up with your friends in a guild and soon you will create your own league. Fantasy Blade is the new happy hour for you and your mates.

- Interesting Features for Spare Time –
In Fantasy Blade, when you don’t want to have fierce conflict, just go to God’s Trial, Tower of Babel, BOSS Siege, relaxing Fishing and so on. Fresh funny events will kill your boring time.

- Intense Live PVP Experience–
1 vs. 1, team vs. team, or guild vs guild. Fight for honor and glory!

COMMUNITY
Visit our official Facebook page and community for the latest news and announcements:
Facebook: www.facebook.com/FantasyBlade
Email: customerservice@rastargames.com
Official Page: ftb.rastargames.com

descriptionHTML:
Orcwar RTS is the best strategy game for Mobile

12 Missions in SinglePlayer for this rts.

Create your army with 9 types of characters:
- Peon allows to collect the Gold or to cut some wood
- Warrior will protect you from attacks opponents in the hand-to-hand fights.
- Archer send arrows on your opponents
- Brut will resist more than your Warrior and will impose more powerful knocks
- Gort use 2 weapons to attack and fastest
- Tank cashes the knocks as the person
- Spy allows to explore quickly
- Mage sends spells on your opponents
- Kaz is the most crazy, he blows up on your opponents, a real Kamikaze

- Hute allows to shelter your units, every Hute can contain 15 units

- SawMill will allow you to unlock Archers and Tank.
- Cauldron will bring to the unlock magician
- Forge to create strong Orcs

Clash of Orc RTS

description: A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.‚ñ†New mode Remix 10Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!‚ñ†New World Tour coursesA brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.‚ñ†World TourRun and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser‚Äôs clutches! Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends.
