comments: I'm really fond of this game and love the gameplay and quick paced matches. The new update is AMAZING!   There are a few things that would make this game extra perfect for me!   Must have character customisation. This would be amazing to me. Char customisation makes me bind more to certain characters. The rings we get don't have much value to them except for upgrading the characters.  Could have non-ranked matches. I would love the option to play/practice against rivals or my own friends.   Should have quick chat responses. Would like to communicate before and after the match with simple reactions. Like Good luck and I win, tee-hee!

To many ads unless you make some kind of purchase. Loading screens seem to take longer than I'd like. You can't at this time play with friends as Opponents are automatically chosen. There is still some characters ability noise in the game even if you have music and sound off. I'd like to see characters abilities not to be so similar, but it isn't taking away from the game at the moment for me. With all that said though the graphics are great, the game is fun, and it's worth the $1.99 purchase I made.

This is one of the best mobile games I have played I a while. I probobly have a bias sense I love Sonic so much. However, if one thing could be added I would say it should be a converter for the Red Star rings to normal rings. Unless you want them to be payed for. I don't really care either way I'll just buy the Red Star rings but I brought up that idea because I currently have 23,000 rings just kinda waiting to be spent. Maybe incorporate phone backgrounds or some customizations for the game that cost extra rings? Thankyou so much for the new update and if anyone I'd debating on installing it just get it. You'll have fun, trust me.

It's basically Sonic Dash PVP mode. But that doesn't change the fact it's fun. Love the steady support of adding new characters and how every character feels unique despite everyone playing the same (sounds weird but you'll understand after you play it) my only gripe is that when I want to play I have to start the app, close it, then restart again otherwise it never loads

A fun premise ruined by a horrendous match making system,  ridiculous  unlocking time gates, and obvious pay to win incentives.  You'll be constantly matched with players with levels far higher than your own and the rewards are minimal for the all the effort.  The constant ads that play after every match is beyond irritating.

Love the game, but there's something wrong.. Well... I think Cream is kinda rigged. Her items are a bit OP for the other players which makes it an easy stage into a extremely hard stage. And also, the deduction of trophies in 4th place is too much! Please make it lower (like maybe at around 5 or 8) and change the deduction of trophies in 3rd place 0 (These are all just suggestions I have). If you read this SEGA, your games are great and keep up the good work!

descriptionHTML:
Mega Monsters is a Q version mobile phone game operated by Teebik inc.

We have exquisite picture, maverick protagonist, cool and gorgeous battle, strange and novel mega monsters. Colorful activities will bring you adventure, exciting and other unprecedented game experience.

The most important damage in game is from the pet. Which can control the attack speed of pet is clicking on mobile phone screen , and the corresponding pet attribute will add extra damage to the Boss.
Tap! Tap!! Tap!!! To fight the demonlord.

The characters can also improve their attack power through skill progression, upgrading of treasures, etc. When the number of levels is higher, the rewards will be improved.

The game is not only to compete with the big monster, the mastery of time and the casting of skills are also a major topic.

Don't forget to use various resources to improve your fighting power. Bring your pet and let's drop the BOSS together!!
summary: Crazy click, finger fight.
title: Mega Monsters Mobile

comments: Found Yu-Gi-Oh on Netflix last week and decided to rewatch it. A few episodes in, and my love for the show rekindled, I got eager to play the game myself. I used to play with Yu-Go-Oh cards when I was a kid but it's been about 12 years since then and so all my old cards are in the loft, not that I know anyone IRL anymore who would fancy a game anyway, and not accessible right now... plus I had forgotten most of the rules too. But this app is just what I was looking for: a way to relearn the rules and have a bit of fun. Perfect for whatever skill level you're at with the game!

this truly an amazing game, there's really only a couple of things, why reduce the monster and spell/trap zones to only 3 cards? I wouldn't say it's bad, I just don't see why you'd need to do it.. plus the average deck size of yugioh is between 40 and 50 cards, why limit us to only a max of 30 cards? (not including the 5 for extra  decks) but all in all its a great game! Finally got my six samurai deck!üòÑ also, I think it'd be an awesome idea to put in a way for duelists to redeem the codes on the cards they've purchased IRL. I bet that'd get even more duelists to play! Just a thought thoughüòä

My app is not opening. I love this game wish you have have out more different cards in the packs. I would like to see swords of reveling light. A bunch of rare magic and trap cards. You should not be able to use Odion's chain reaction duel sense in the PvP duels.

Just sad if only they could fix the  zone to 5 monsters spell and trap cards. Plus the starting with 5 cards and the original deck size and life points to 8000 it would be soo good. Hope you do that and fix it im sure more ppl would  play this if you do

Trash, true fans would never say this game is great. Only 3 monster and spell/trap zones and the person that goes first only starts with 4 cards? Really? Not to mention the terrible camera angles and rigged matches. If you're a competitive player that doesn't like to get bs, don't play this.

your shuffle scheme for decks and opening hand is ridiculous. every TIME I play a live person your scheme gives me a hand I can't even use. but when when I battle am AI I get the best hand possible. if I only have 6 spell cards in my deck I should not get 4 spell cards as an opening hand every time I duel a live person!!! FIX IT dozens of other players have the same complaint
description: Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience![FEATURES]Fighting Card Games- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missionsOnline Multiplayer Battles- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai! - Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!Card Battle Deck- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!- Shop for cards in the game store!Stay tuned for future card additions![ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.[Supported OS]Android 4.4 and above
descriptionHTML:
Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!

Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience!


[FEATURES]

Fighting Card Games
- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks
- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!
- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!
- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missions

Online Multiplayer Battles
- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai!
- Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize
- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!

Card Battle Deck
- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!
- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top
- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!
- Shop for cards in the game store!
Stay tuned for future card additions!

[ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and above
summary: Card games with epic monsters! Fight other Duelists in online PVP battles!
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links

description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.

comments: Best pool graphic wise but the game is not fair what so ever. Game is Controlled you don't decide if you win the game does. Your win percentage and rank don't mean squat. Cues length and force controlled to games advantage even when reloaded. I had 6,991,000 and my win percentage was 61.3 and lost 1 million 5x in a row. How do I have a 61.3% chance of winning and lose so easily by these 40-50% players like nothing. If you don't actually buy stuff with actual money on app game will treat you poorly.

8 ball i have been playing it for sometime now and I spend alot of money on the specials.. great specials.. but I noticed whenever I buy coins I don't win any games until those coins are over and I'm only winning recently 2 games maximum in a row and normally my win streak used to be 7 and above... I don't know why this is happening but it sucks because it's putting me off the game.. it's like 8 ball is making sure I'm losing hence the rate 3

Hey miniclip.. good morning.. i am from india.. i was playing 8 ball pool dubai match. I was just about to win when i hit my solid ball and then last black ball was left but the ball goes in opponents hand said that you didn't hit your ball.. what was that? Can you please stop all these hacks and all for other users. There is no fair gameplay between each other.. please do some favourable to all users.  Hope you will take quick action in this manner Thanks.. Apoorv

First of all It's joyful game few notes need to address it:    1_last 3 weeks is suddenly stopped without farther notification.. And I was about to uninstall it..     2_one of the question was you can play with other users offline. This is not correct!...     3_ need to add "Edit and changing names"     4_Game rated with 5 star.. Than you all üé±

I realize y'all gotta get paid but why make the playing experience for those of us that don't pay cash money.  Not allowing a player to select a pocket when shooting the 8 ball and allowing your opponent to shoot and win. I guess I'm pretty good because nobody has been able to get rid of me playing pool. Instead I seem to get strange lock ups or no response from game. I always seem to lose 100s of thousands. It's a pretty good app and I've sent many people to download your app.

This is the most addictive game i have playing since a bought this phone. All the new updates are cool. Need to get rid of those hackers playin along. Also when we get a phonecall the game reopens, its better if you  reconnect it during the tier its self .. very plesent game give lots of happiness.. make sure you work with above mentioned glitches, then 5* is sure.

description: Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!
descriptionHTML:
Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!

Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!

Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!

You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!

Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!

As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.

So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!

summary: Shave 'em like a pro! live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!
title: Barber Shop Simulator 3D

comments: Love the concept, but it doesn't work at ALL. I downloaded it, and no matter what I do, nor how absolutely silent it is, the chicken is running and jumping and I have zero control over it. Super disappointed--hopefully it's just glitching?? I wanted to try it, but neither sound nor silence give me any control over it üò£

Ads are frequent and long. The audio sensitivity is difficult to judge. There is no mute button for the game's audio and the sounds interfere with the movements. When I jump, he lands and jumps a second time from the sound of the landing or a coin. Have to turn the media on my phone all the way down to fix it.  Add game sound settings or make the music and movements not register for the chicken. Shorten the ads. And maybe change the visuals to be a little less "flappy bird"-like.

People complain about the ads but 2 dollars is all you need to remove them. Cheap and it supports this fun game. If your game audio is interrupting the jumping then plug in some ear buds, it's that easy people!

It's a great game, hilarious concept, only thing I have issues with is that the noises for picking up the coins pick up as sound. Frustrating when you are trying to be careful and it dings and sends the chicken into a mine... Maybe make them doubtless so they don't get picked up by mic.

Good game but enough with the ads. Way too many and way too long. The ads are longer than the game play. Ine ad was over 30 seconds long. You guys obviously do not read these comments or reply to any of them. This could be a great game.

Way too many adds. The adds block the sensitivity, so I cant adjust that, so I have to scream as hard I can for a jump. Then a 30 sec minimum add almost every retry. No thanks. Could be entertaining though
description: Chicken scream is a fun and interactive non tapping addictive game where your voice controls the chicken. Make a lot of noise to force the chicken to run and jump or stay quiet to control the chicken moves slowly. Get your high score and collect points for getting far in the game but be careful about the obstacles and the water!**** How to play and control the chicken ? ****- Don't make any noise to make the chicken stop- Speak softly to make the chicken walk- Scream to make the chicken jump
descriptionHTML:
Chicken scream is a fun and interactive non tapping addictive game where your voice controls the chicken.

Make a lot of noise to force the chicken to run and jump or stay quiet to control the chicken moves slowly.

Get your high score and collect points for getting far in the game but be careful about the obstacles and the water!

**** How to play and control the chicken ? ****

- Don't make any noise to make the chicken stop
- Speak softly to make the chicken walk
- Scream to make the chicken jump

comments: Love all the delicious Emily games, however I don't like how you have to connect to Facebook to earn a trophy, and some of the game controls didn't work correctly all the time. The swipe motion didn't seem to work very well on a lot of levels making me replay the same level multiple times because swipe wouldn't work and would mess up the whole level. I almost deleted it because of this but I'm glad I stuck with it.

i just started to play the game and was really enjoying it. Nice story line and fun to play. Then it got to the point at level 2 where the crib section was and the ads stop loading try again later. I keep trying to go back after waiting to play and it still gives me the same response. $10 to pay for a game is extremely expensive, I have never seen a game on google play for that amount of money. Most are free or free trial but not at the rate you guys charge. Seriously? you guys need to be more reasonable because the majority of your players are kids. So a word to the developer. If you want to attract and keep your content enjoyable for all ages, make it affordable to all young and old. Im just saying. I myself enjoyed the game overall, but I honestly will not pay that amount to play the game when there are so many other games to play that are free for all.

Great game, love the back story and the different levels. Only issue was on level 51 the story telling part/intro didn't work, there was no dialogue, all I could do was press skip. I tried updating the app and clear the cache and it still didn't work.

I love this game! Storylines amazing, graphics amazing, levels amazing, music amazing... the only problems I had with the game were a couple glitches with the advertisements, and level and i had to skip level 51 because of some weird glitch,  but otherwise the game was the best!

descriptionHTML:
Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...

Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼

🍼 WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's life
🍼 PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levels
🍼 GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first hand
🍼 DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related places
🍼 HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, François and Allison, plus many others
🍼 CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby room
🍼 TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every day
🍼 CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved ones

Will you be there for Emily when she needs you most?

Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. 🎥 🍝 It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...

On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... She's not feeling well, because she's pregnant! 👶

Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!

Help Emily through this emotional rollercoaster and get ready to experience the miracles of life! ❤

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

comments: Developers, please read.  First, this is a fun game and I enjoy its play style. It's reminiscent of TV shows like Battles Bots and game series' like Bot Arena.   Second, I would like to suggest giving players the ability to add, delete, and move weapon, utility, and wheel anchors. In the same way players can currently add enhancements to parts and chassis's and move around stickers.   Third, It would be appreciated if Quick Play Super Boxes replaced Regular Boxes after all shipment slots are full. It would provide a greater incentive to keep playing Quick Play beyond just Winning Streak Crown Rewards.  I'm offering these suggestions because I really enjoy this game and would like to see it become a more fulfilling and personalized experience.  Thank you,

This game is have potential, don't ruined it because of money. I have never been watching so many ads In my life just to get some 2 stars parts. Instead of being creative and making cool machines, this game is turning to - either pay to win or watch alot of ads to win. What's the point of "playing" in this game?

I think this app is great! But there is a slight problem with selling items. When I repeatedly sell items, sometimes if, for example, I was selling an item for 6831 coins, then it would subtract 6831 from the total amount of coins I have and then add back in 6831 so I'd end up with just the same amount of coins I was at! Could you please fix this small bug? It would make this app even better!

Good game fun to play spent cash in-game. One issue my moat recent purchase I bought 4 boxes and a bundle of gems in a deal, I got the gems and one of the boxes then my game said there was an error and reloaded leaving me without my other boxes!!! Other than this it's a fun and easy game with little to no major issues

I absolutely love this game. I spend a lot of time on it! It's fairly balanced between players who play for free and those who purchase gems to give their bots better stats. You can easily rank up without paying a dime. I did for so long, until I kept hoarding pieces and didn't want to sell. I began to use gems instead of coins.

Fun strategy game, just wish it was easier to understand upgrades and easier to get a decent vehicle. Sometimes you have to wait for boxes other times you can watch ads to get thru them with no rhyme or reason as far as I can tell. The variety or maybe the lack of variety in boxes is pretty annoying. Sometimes you get the exact same part multiple times or with slight variations, which can drag out trying to get a decent upgrade on things.

comments: Fun game and I love the graphics. However the dealer does tend to string along some multi card 21's.  If I have a 12 and take a hit I bust almost every time. If the dealer is showing a 2 I've seen him hit 5 times and get 21. I love to play in the casino. Yes it happens. But not this often.  I have played several different black Jack games. This one is by far the best. I would recommend this game to anyone that loves blackjack.  I do not play poker so I will not comment.

Awesome game with great gameplay and graphics but it's totally rigged towards the dealer. As others have stated, the game lets you win a lot at the start, to draw you in. However, once you get to certain level, you lose at a unrealistic level. I seen the dealers get 3 blackjacks out of 5 games ina row on 2 different tables. Totally rigged. Pretty sure this method is to draw you in and then once you lose a great number of chips, the AI pressures you to buy more chips with REAL currency.

I'm reading these reviews, and I'm shocked.. This is hands down one of the most fair games I've played on mobile. Graphics are excellent. If this game just had one slot game to go along with these table games, this game would have it all. Is it possible to give just one slot game? Anyways, please keep up the great work.

Designed to draw you in with a fair game. Reach a decent amount of chips and you find yourself loosing 14_15  hands consecutively with each hand being 5,6....13,14,15 ext... Dealer pulls some extraordinary results. Buy more chips is bottom line... Piss poor...

Def worth the download. You can play with people that you know easily. Smaller tasks and challenges help you to constantly have ways to get more chips for playing. Great selection of tables, perfect graphics and no issues at all with the program.

Only played an hour so far but I can already see the house has a great advantage in both Blackjack and Roulette.  Impossible strings of house wins makes the game more than challenging.  Still fun however. Great graphics.

description: Your name is Bobby and you're stuck in your dreams. Dreams about beast fights with gangs. Although the fights is beast, but it involve flat humans.You have strange dreams about how human from gangs fall from a great height to a flat floor.To get rid of these dreams you have to take part in beast fighting without rules with other gangs and flat human. Be smart and use the environment in your favor.Drop plasticine human from a great height onto a flat floor. But do not be afraid, you will not harm them. After all, these thick funny and clumsy little humans are made of clay. They do not hurt at all.Therefore, use the boldest decisions to win in these beast battles without rules. Remember that physics is your assistant. Win in battles without rules wrestling, to get rid of these ridiculous dreams about the fall of human on a flat floor.
descriptionHTML:
Your name is Bobby and you're stuck in your dreams. Dreams about beast fights with gangs. Although the fights is beast, but it involve flat humans.
You have strange dreams about how human from gangs fall from a great height to a flat floor.
To get rid of these dreams you have to take part in beast fighting without rules with other gangs and flat human. Be smart and use the environment in your favor.
Drop plasticine human from a great height onto a flat floor. But do not be afraid, you will not harm them. After all, these thick funny and clumsy little humans are made of clay. They do not hurt at all.
Therefore, use the boldest decisions to win in these beast battles without rules. Remember that physics is your assistant. Win in battles without rules wrestling, to get rid of these ridiculous dreams about the fall of human on a flat floor.
summary: Get free of your dreams about falling human on a flat floor
title: Flat Human Fall on Floor - Beasts Fights

descriptionHTML:
Your mission, should you choose to accept it…
Infiltrate secure locations and eliminate high-profile targets, perform lethal strikes and confront the Syndicate across the globe.
This message will self-destruct…

TRACK THE SYNDICATE ACROSS THE GLOBE
Take out enemy agents, destroy rogue bases, eliminate the single high-profile target that matters most or silently/stealthily complete the objective in locations around the globe!

COMPLETE IMPOSSIBLE MISSIONS
Complete the mission objectives as you stop the Syndicate and assist the IMF. Stake out targets from long range, take them down with well-placed shots, assault enemy bases head-on or infiltrate enemy lines without compromising your identity

EQUIP ADVANCED WEAPONRY & GEAR
Load up on weapons like sniper rifles, assault rifles, heavy guns and gauss rifles then upgrade them. Don’t forget to grab the latest gear as well like rocket launchers, throwing knives, med kits, armor, and more!

DESTROY ENEMY BASES AND DEFEND YOURS
Assault other players’ HQ, steal their resources, and defend your IMF HQ against attack! Fortify your defenses with upgrades like drones to repel even the most stubborn attackers.

JOIN AND FORM AGENCIES
Form an IMF agency with other players and work together towards a common goal. Combine your resources to level up the agency and receive better rewards for all members!

High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!

description: The player controls Master Higgins, a young man who ventured to Adventure Island in the South Pacific after hearing that the Evil Witch Doctor kidnapped Princess Leilani.        To rescue her, Higgins must survive a series of 32 stages. There are eight worlds called 'areas', which are divided four stages or 'rounds' each, which are further divided into four checkpoints.     When the player reaches the fourth round of each area, he must confront a boss at the end to continue to the next area. The game is completed when the player saves the girl after defeating the eighth and final form of the evil lord.     Master Higgins (the player character) loses a life whenever he touches an enemy, an enemy's attack or a fire roast, or when he falls into a pitfall or a body of water.     Moreover, the player also has a health gauge that starts out with 11 points, which gradually depletes over time or whenever Higgins trips on a rock in his path.     When Higgins' health gauge reaches zero, he will lose a life as well. If Higgins still has extra lives left, he will revive at the last checkpoint he passed through.     The game ends when all of Higgins' lives runs out. To replenish his health, Higgins can pick up numerous fruits (or a milk bottle) on his path (his maximum health reaches up to 13 points). When the player's score reaches 50,000 points, 100,000 points, and 200,000 points, Higgins will receive an extra life.     Finding a bee-like fairy known as Honey Girl will grant Higgins invincibility for fifteen seconds and allow him to kill enemies with a single touch.    Higgins starts off each life without the ability to attack and can only gain the ability to attack by picking up a stone axe, which can be found in specific spots in each stage. When Higgins is wielding the stone axe, he can trade it for magical fireballs that have longer range and are capable of destroying rocks and rolling stones (which are invulnerable to the stone axe).    To break an egg, the player must touch it or hit with a weapon twice. In addition to weapons, there are numerous bonus items stuck inside. There is also a negative item, the 'eggplant', which drains Higgins' life meter.     Some of the eggs are not immediately visible in plain sight. The locations of these 'hidden eggs' are usually indicated when a weapon thrown by a player disappears before falling to the ground and are uncovered by jumping at the indicated spot.     Some of these hidden spots don't contain hidden eggs, but instead a cloud that will warp the player to a bonus stage, which is instead uncovered by standing still for a short period of time. At the bonus stages, the player can collect a series of fruits (each worth 500 points regardless of the type) until Higgins falls into a pitfall. However, instead of losing a life, he will return to the regular stage at the next checkpoint.        At the fourth round of each area, Higgins will confront a different form of the Evil Witch Doctor, the game's boss character. He has the ability to change his head by up to eight different types. Higgins must defeat him by striking his head a specific amount of times with his weapon.     The number of hits required to defeat him increases with each area (his first form requires eight hits and every subsequent form requires two additional hits until the eighth and final form, which requires 22 hits).     When the Evil Witch Doctor is defeated, he will change his head and escape to the next area. He uses the same attack in each form, with the only thing that changes besides his durability are his mobility speed and the speed of his fireball attacks. When Higgins defeats his final form, the Evil Witch Doctor will fall into a pit and the girl will be rescued.[Control]Direction Pad: moves Master Higgins left or rightA Button: Master Higgins jumpsB Button: shoots weapons or hold while running/jumping to make him run faster/jump farther*This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
descriptionHTML:
The player controls Master Higgins, a young man who ventured to Adventure Island in the South Pacific after hearing that the Evil Witch Doctor kidnapped Princess Leilani.

To rescue her, Higgins must survive a series of 32 stages. There are eight worlds called 'areas', which are divided four stages or 'rounds' each, which are further divided into four checkpoints.

When the player reaches the fourth round of each area, he must confront a boss at the end to continue to the next area. The game is completed when the player saves the girl after defeating the eighth and final form of the evil lord.

Master Higgins (the player character) loses a life whenever he touches an enemy, an enemy's attack or a fire roast, or when he falls into a pitfall or a body of water.

Moreover, the player also has a health gauge that starts out with 11 points, which gradually depletes over time or whenever Higgins trips on a rock in his path.

When Higgins' health gauge reaches zero, he will lose a life as well. If Higgins still has extra lives left, he will revive at the last checkpoint he passed through.

The game ends when all of Higgins' lives runs out. To replenish his health, Higgins can pick up numerous fruits (or a milk bottle) on his path (his maximum health reaches up to 13 points). When the player's score reaches 50,000 points, 100,000 points, and 200,000 points, Higgins will receive an extra life.

Finding a bee-like fairy known as Honey Girl will grant Higgins invincibility for fifteen seconds and allow him to kill enemies with a single touch.

Higgins starts off each life without the ability to attack and can only gain the ability to attack by picking up a stone axe, which can be found in specific spots in each stage. When Higgins is wielding the stone axe, he can trade it for magical fireballs that have longer range and are capable of destroying rocks and rolling stones (which are invulnerable to the stone axe).

To break an egg, the player must touch it or hit with a weapon twice. In addition to weapons, there are numerous bonus items stuck inside. There is also a negative item, the 'eggplant', which drains Higgins' life meter.

Some of the eggs are not immediately visible in plain sight. The locations of these 'hidden eggs' are usually indicated when a weapon thrown by a player disappears before falling to the ground and are uncovered by jumping at the indicated spot.

Some of these hidden spots don't contain hidden eggs, but instead a cloud that will warp the player to a bonus stage, which is instead uncovered by standing still for a short period of time. At the bonus stages, the player can collect a series of fruits (each worth 500 points regardless of the type) until Higgins falls into a pitfall. However, instead of losing a life, he will return to the regular stage at the next checkpoint.

At the fourth round of each area, Higgins will confront a different form of the Evil Witch Doctor, the game's boss character. He has the ability to change his head by up to eight different types. Higgins must defeat him by striking his head a specific amount of times with his weapon.

The number of hits required to defeat him increases with each area (his first form requires eight hits and every subsequent form requires two additional hits until the eighth and final form, which requires 22 hits).

When the Evil Witch Doctor is defeated, he will change his head and escape to the next area. He uses the same attack in each form, with the only thing that changes besides his durability are his mobility speed and the speed of his fireball attacks. When Higgins defeats his final form, the Evil Witch Doctor will fall into a pit and the girl will be rescued.

[Control]
Direction Pad: moves Master Higgins left or right
A Button: Master Higgins jumps
B Button: shoots weapons or hold while running/jumping to make him run faster/jump farther

*This game doesn't support Android 8.0+

comments: First off it is a first person shooter game, so violence is a part of the vocabulary; get over it. Game does not bombart w/ adverts. Realistic considering for a mobile device game. The developers did a superb job with its comical graphics, story line, and accuracies with equipment.  It was plain and simple awesome! I would download more games coming from the same source. They're good at what they do.

I rarely leave ratings for games, but this one is an exception. The storyline was intriguing and suspenseful. Each chapter finishes better then the last. Gameplay was great, the pistol controls are a little tricky to operate as the action is fast pace, but the Sniper controls have little to no problems, as you get to take your time. Sound quality is not bad, graphics throw an interesting touch, all while having little to no technical problems. Ads pop up quite frequently (though not as much as other games). However, it can easily be bypassed by turning off your Internet as this game does not require internet to operate. Great game overall. Can't wait for the sequels.

Awesome visuals, even a more awesome story. Not like other sniper games where it's just shoot some random person. The best shooter/sniper game in the play store. Super dope game!! BUT there's one major flaw that's makes the game near unplayable one some of the missions the crosshairs aren't accurate and one point. Specifically the mission when the gravity element is introduced. I know that I am perfectly lined up but I still miss. Please fix this, make it more accurate and it will be a perfect game.

This game is amazing! It's the standard that other sniper games should try to achieve! The graphics are incredible, the gameplay is amazing, the game is always new (not repetitive like some games). I've never enjoyed a mobile game so much.      There's also different kinds of missions. So one mission you'll be trying to snipe a dealer, and the next you'll be using a pistol to clear rooms! I played the game over and over again.

Best sniper game EVER!! Has a storyline, cool cartoon type graphics, nice upgradeable guns and stuff. Only thing is the energy. Not going to mark down but maybe could you make it like only uses energy for retrys or something, But other than that, DOWNLOAD YOU WON'T REGRET IT!

Game creates great atmosphere with ambient sound and music. Controls are responsive but require a learning curve to master, especially the pistol. However, the ads that play inbetween the missions do break the imersion somewhat. Overall, a well polished game that offers a welcome surprise to the shoot-em-up genre in the app store.
description: 17+ NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN!LONEWOLF is an intense game with moral conflicts.1 Minute: Your mental-noise has calmed down. It's just you and your weapon.2 Minutes: You feel the wind, you know the distance, you sense your target's movements3 Minutes : You hear the echo of your gunfire... You made the first kill. Silence.Can you handle it? The story unfolds..Get immersed in a deep Neo-Noir story driven sniper adventure game.You step into the role of a mysterious assassin. His motives - a secret. You did what had to be done to enter the 'Assembly', a criminal organization.Who is this man? What happened? Soon you'll realize that there's more to him than meets the eye.The mesmerizing atmosphere and thrilling story will glue you to your device.While you work for the 'Assembly' you'll get your hands on various weapons.Sniper Rifles, Assault rifles, Pistols, Bombs and even your bare hands.There's more than 20 Weapons to unlock, upgrade and collect!- 5+ Hours Story Mode- 30 Missions- Hand Drawn Cutscenes- More than 20 Weapons- Realistic Weapon Sound and Recoil- A Dozen Mini-games- Several shooting Ranges- Trophy Room with more than 40 trophies- From the publisher of Clear Vision
descriptionHTML:
17+ NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN!
LONEWOLF is an intense game with moral conflicts.

1 Minute: Your mental-noise has calmed down. It's just you and your weapon.
2 Minutes: You feel the wind, you know the distance, you sense your target's movements
3 Minutes : You hear the echo of your gunfire... You made the first kill. Silence.

Can you handle it? The story unfolds..

Get immersed in a deep Neo-Noir story driven sniper adventure game.
You step into the role of a mysterious assassin. His motives - a secret.
You did what had to be done to enter the 'Assembly', a criminal organization.

Who is this man? What happened? Soon you'll realize that there's more to him than meets the eye.
The mesmerizing atmosphere and thrilling story will glue you to your device.

While you work for the 'Assembly' you'll get your hands on various weapons.
Sniper Rifles, Assault rifles, Pistols, Bombs and even your bare hands.

There's more than 20 Weapons to unlock, upgrade and collect!

- 5+ Hours Story Mode
- 30 Missions
- Hand Drawn Cutscenes
- More than 20 Weapons
- Realistic Weapon Sound and Recoil
- A Dozen Mini-games
- Several shooting Ranges
- Trophy Room with more than 40 trophies
- From the publisher of Clear Vision
recentChanges: - Discover Lonewolf's past in a brand new chapter!
- Get your hands on brand new Rifles & Scopes!
- You can now replay all missions with both Rifles and Handguns!
- Many optimisations and bug fixes to enhance your gaming experience!
summary: Get immersed in a deep Neo-Noir story driven sniper adventure game.
title: LONEWOLF (17+)

comments: It's fun till you run out of energy. They get you too rate the game right away while you are having fun with free lives. Give you enough lives to rate it good then the lives end and you have to watch a min advert or 30 mins for one life Regen. OR PAY. They just want your money at that point. So sad.

I absolutely loved this game but after the latest update I can't get enough gems to help pass the last level! It also takes entirely too long to get updates with new restaurants!  Day after day of not being able to play is why I will be deleting this game this week if there isn't any improvement!

You don't get it but no one wants to play a game which you can't play whenever you please because energy is limited and you have to wait for it to be refilled. Trust me I hate this and I am sure everyone else who plays this also. Get this removed so that I can play as many times I want and whenever I want! Otherwise your game is great. It's a nice app but I might uninstall it because I can't play it all the time!

Um...what happened? The game was fun to play until that the tasks had been getting ridiculous that even I was playing with the highest speed I still won't make it on time or I won't even get as many costumers as the tasks said so, and not only that I've been playing extra job levels and guess what? I'm not gaining any gems

This game is exactly the cooking game I was looking for. It was so much fun and then suddenly it became impossible. I have over $100,000 and it means nothing. You can't do anything without huge amounts of gems. I bought some and bought one thing and they were basically gone. I had to use 2 powerups to pass the level (and that was only 1 level). What a waste.

Some levels are deliberately designed  for the player to buy/shell out 67 gems just to 'pass' the level. Seriously??  67 gems?  Gahd,  please fix this and lower down # of gems required!! I stopped at level127 because there is no way for me to move forward. Fix this. Impress us.

comments: It takes so long to get through the levels and to get to the next region well who knows how long that will take, it's been at least 6 months waiting on the next region. The game will award you money and then a few missions later take back money. I'm hoping that when I reach level 50 that I get the next region or I will be done with this game. Also once you get over a billion dollars your skill shots really don't count for anything so it makes the game that much more boring.

One of the best Android games - keep coming back to this one A little glitchy at times. But overall a good game, smooth game play, lots of variety, good graphics and layout. Its one of the few Android games I keep coming back to. And, although there are in-game purchases, i think you can play all of this game without making any purchases. I'm on level 41 and haven't made any extra purchases. I have watched a lot of adverts to earn extra in-game gold - but I think this is a fair trade for the quality of game you're getting back.

Love it, ready for a new level! I've been playing this for quite some time now. Love all the features. Nice and simplistic. Tried the other bravo and seemed a bit too many options so I'm trying to stick with this however it has been quite some time since the release of a new region. I'm getting close to giving up. Surviving with the daily challenges and the special ops on the weekend and midweek but ready to spend these 10 gun upgrades and so many other things I have saved up to use but nothing worth spending it on. Tighten up guys!

Kill shot I like the game a lot ,fun but the gold you get is not enough and less you buy it you don't get past the 2nd level and a real sniper would never bring his gun down to reload the chamber like it does for the bought sniper rifles. Need to make the prices for the equipment more realistic and able to buy the semi-auto sniper rifles without gold.üò†üòï

The game is really good, however energy refilling takes 10 minutes to fill a single bar. The player has 10 bars of energy when full, so when the bar energy is empty it then takes an hour and forty minutes to refill. Which in my opinion is a bit too long as the amount of energy needed for the special missions emptys the bar too quick. I understand this makes the game challenging and where in app purchases help, however please lower the refilling time to an hour. This would really make your gameplay time longer and thus encouraging more in app purchases. Other than that it really is an awesome game.

I wish you could by more guns with cash instead of gold. You litterally have to play for a whole year to get enough gold to get a top of the line gun. And you cant do it thru playing support missions which only give you cash. Others than that, it's been a great game. Anything that keeps my attention for a whole year is worth playing

comments: This is by far the best chess "trainer" for me.  It's got a nice flow and the game isn't "stupid" like most other chess apps/games I've played.  I plat at least a few games every night and I feel like it give me a nice challenge and makes me really think about the moves I'm making.  Especially at the higher difficulty levels.  Overall a great chess app with no glitches and a good brain inside of it.  A must for a chess player with any real skill at the game.

I really was worried it would be too easy or too tough. tho I am not a master, yet, I know my way around the board.  I realized it has been making me a spectacular player ..the computer does not just do the same dumb moves over and over its almost like its stalking me like prey around the board! ha great game!!!-!!

I love this game and the best brain exerciser game ever in the history.  The cool 3d view makes the game as if I am playing on the real board, very good graphics. However, it doesn't show the list of killed chessman during game play the only drawback. I am expecting this upgradation and this will be the perfect Android chess.

For the non experts, let me tell you that 5his game cheats. I sat with a real chessboard to analyse why wasn't I  able to crack master level.   And what i observed was it didn't allow you to make actual moves when you show high levels of intell8gence. Sometimes it makes moves which are faulty. I think there is some mistakes in coding, perhaps deliberately made.  So not a fair play but a foul play.

So far it's o.k. I like the fact that it is simply a chess game with no fancy sound effects or graphics. I see no real reason to have the higher difficulty levels locked out until they are beaten but they are. I got it to practice with. It is useful for that. It's not bad...Just a simple down to earth chess game

The game has been drawn because the other player has no legal move and is not in check. If they can ot move then I win because they cannot move to a legal position. The computer ends the games too early because they cannot be bothered to chase you around the board. You cannot unlock the higher difficulty games because it just says draw.
description: Chess in your AndroidChess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.Features:- five different themes- seven levels of difficulty- two players mode- game assistant (Helper)- realistic graphics- sound effects- small size
descriptionHTML:
Chess in your Android

Chess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.

During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.

Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.

Features:

- five different themes
- seven levels of difficulty
- two players mode
- game assistant (Helper)
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- small size
summary: Chess is a board logic game with beautiful graphics and progressive levels
title: Chess

comments: Definitely pay to win. When you scroll up or down it thinks you are clicking on something. Stamina is a nightmare as when you reach a high enough level that takes more xp to level up, you can't play for hours as it takes to long to recharge. Should make gems easier to get for non paying players so it is more fair. Other than that pretty good.

One of the few games that I don't mind spending a bit i.e. $10+ every month. Requires team guild effort to achieve stuffs together definitely gives a good feeling. Event is weekly and community is lively. Card's artwork feels like Rage of Bahamut but using matching puzzle style to deal damage. Skills of card matter as well increasing the complexity and fun. Only thing to improve would be cheaper ingame currency to encourage more people to have better decks thus higher activity rates.

It's a lot other games of this type. I haven't been able to find a problem with it yet. Great graphics although the timer is a bit fast when you're looking up connections. If you had a button that the players would push when they couldn't find any more connections, that would be great!

Number one of the best games I have ever played on my phone. I'm watching ads for bonus experience when sacrificing my cards. And I love the fact of that availability. Especially since it pays them which increases chances of more games like this one. Keep up the great work. Really helping my cognitive development of pattern recognition

Dont expect any support for this game. I've been locked out and i am still waiting on a resolution, like many here. I've paid money and i know i wont be getting any compensation let alone how long its going to take to fix it.

Its a match 3, pay to win game with heroes. Its pay to win lootbox style pay to win mechanics enures that unless you are extremely lucky or9 intend to pay alot, you wouldnt win jack. The match 3 RNG can also make the game infuriating, such as when there is little to no matches or the matches are for colors which yohr team doesnt have. However, unlike other match 3 games, it is fun for longer.

description: It's a desert island survival game. This is a dead and spreading arena. The zombie virus crisis has infected the deserted island town village. As the most powerful member of the special forces, you have been dropped into the desert island. To save the survivors and to stop the zombie virus from causing the city to harm the outside city is your mission.But is there a real survivor here? At a glance, the deserted islands, towns, suburbs and beaches are densely packed with zombies. It is hard for them to find and save survivors. The infected humans have lost their sense and become bloodthirsty demons. Time is less, the respected hero, are you ready to become a real Zombie Hunter?This is an exciting zombie shooting game , you can use a sub machine gun , a pistol , shotgun , sniper rifle to kill the zombies , and grenades , ice and other props to help themselves to blaze a new trail . Watch out for the evil clown . He is the crisis maker . However , as the final boss , he is not easily defeated . He should upgrade your weapon , aim , shoot and fire to make sure that every shot can cause real harm to the clown . Try to get the ultimate epic weapon - one of the most powerful sniper guns . He will make you invincible , a gun to save the city is not a fantasy , are vital to every action , aiming and shooting . You are shouldering the mission of saving the world !You can choose an assault rifle or a sniper gun , a shooter or a sniper hidden in the dark , depending on your choice . Emergency hands to push , fearless . If you choose to become a sniper but you have to keep a strangely calm , no matter how crazy zombies , you have to calm the sniper , aiming and shooting ! The silent villas chamber , the old car repaired shop , and the ugly mutant zombies are everywhere . The exciting shooting competition will rush your adrenaline rush . Countless zombies are not terrible . what is terrible is that you have no comrades in arms of this desert island . You are a lonely hero . Hold the gun in your hands tightly , unlock the arsenal of powerful weapons , it will help you to survive .Saving the survivors is one of your missions, but not the most important mission. When you save the survivors, the helicopters will not rush to rescue immediately. You have to find how to transfer the survivors. Your ultimate mission is to eliminate the zombie virus on the island, or if the virus flows into the outside world, the consequences will be unthinkable. Control your firearms, judge whether to open the sight on the zombie distance, and every shot may affect the final result of the battle!This is a war to save the human race, and this victory depends on you as a hero and you are in the hands of the sniper rifle!Game features:A shocking gun shooting soundReal feeling of bullet shootingThe horror of the zombiesCombination of various modes of assault and snipingUltra large 3D scenes and ultra far horizon

Words are a bit too easy. They're ok if you're learning English but for us English speakers they're too simple. I suppose though it depends on whether you're a good speller or not. Still, it'd keep me amused whilst sitting on a bus or a train. It IS  a very good way to begin learning English though. 4 stars if there were more variety. Ye the ads are a damn nuisance. It's true it's a speed thing more than a spelling test. So if you're ancient, like me, it Does help the ol brain box think faster.

Way too many ads, for one thing. Also, since I'm a pretty good speller and move through the various games rather quickly, I feel that the listed "Top 20" scores are unrealistic, some reaching 5 to 6 figures. Can someone explain this to me?

It is the ever best game of mine. We can learn here many things . Before exam or test all the teachers regularly saying that you must learn all the difficult spellings.  It will help us . So my appeal to all the people who want to make their brain very intelligent  . So please install this attractive game .
Not bad. Confusing Leaderboard tho. Have to actually move your eye muscles to look for the right name or time of when you played.  Damn I sound like my brother!!

It is a fun game, in fact the game ideas are phenomenal. However, the ads pop up while I am actually playing the game. To top that off, every time I try to go back to the games, it repeats the previous game I did or goes into another ad and freezes at the end. Removing the game for those reasons.
description: Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational game for all ages that will improve your English spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game is 100% free and does not contain any In-App purchases. Spelling Master contains 7 different spelling games and highscores gameplay, so don't forget to submit your score at the end of the game to see who is the true Spelling Master! If you prefer playing with no limits, then check a Practice mode!Go for highscores!Game modes:- One word 2 forms - 2 forms of one word to be shown, choose the correct one!- Find Misspelled - out of 4 words (3 correct + 1 incorrect) choose the misspelled one!- Find Correct - out of 4 words (3 misspelled + 1 correct) choose the correct one!- Which Letter.. - remember a word on screen and then type a letter that lies on position X..!- Decide - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect!- Decide & Correct - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect and if incorrect choose the correct form!- Multiple Choice - mark all the correct words!- Practice - random category with no limits (no lives, no time limit).Scoring & limits: - your points depend on your speed, faster you find the answer more points you get- some puzzles have time limit, some rounds and in all of them you are also limited by number of lives- you can review points of other people by pressing the star icons in the main menu Features:* Entertaining English spelling game for all ages* 7 different spelling games* See your overall progress and stats for each game mode* Review all the words you played with in each game* Local highscores - storing your best points for each mode* Global highscores - submit your score and review points of other people from all around the world!* Share your score via facebook, google+, whatsapp and other social networks* Each game is different* Hundreds of most misspelled English words included* A must game for all the spelling bee fans* 100% free full version with no In-App purchasesHave a nice time playing our word game Spelling Master and if you like the game and want to support it please leave a review and rate the game. Thank you for your support!If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!Support links:Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/Email: littlebigplay@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay* Improve your English vocabulary and dictionary
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational game for all ages that will improve your English spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game is 100% free and does not contain any In-App purchases.

Spelling Master contains 7 different spelling games and highscores gameplay, so don't forget to submit your score at the end of the game to see who is the true Spelling Master! If you prefer playing with no limits, then check a Practice mode!

Go for highscores!

Game modes:
- One word 2 forms - 2 forms of one word to be shown, choose the correct one!
- Find Misspelled - out of 4 words (3 correct + 1 incorrect) choose the misspelled one!
- Find Correct - out of 4 words (3 misspelled + 1 correct) choose the correct one!
- Which Letter.. - remember a word on screen and then type a letter that lies on position X..!
- Decide - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect!
- Decide & Correct - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect and if incorrect choose the correct form!
- Multiple Choice - mark all the correct words!
- Practice - random category with no limits (no lives, no time limit).

Scoring & limits:
- your points depend on your speed, faster you find the answer more points you get
- some puzzles have time limit, some rounds and in all of them you are also limited by number of lives
- you can review points of other people by pressing the star icons in the main menu

Features:

* Entertaining English spelling game for all ages
* 7 different spelling games
* See your overall progress and stats for each game mode
* Review all the words you played with in each game
* Local highscores - storing your best points for each mode
* Global highscores - submit your score and review points of other people from all around the world!
* Share your score via facebook, google+, whatsapp and other social networks
* Each game is different
* Hundreds of most misspelled English words included
* A must game for all the spelling bee fans
* 100% free full version with no In-App purchases

Have a nice time playing our word game Spelling Master and if you like the game and want to support it please leave a review and rate the game. Thank you for your support!

If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!

Support links:
Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/
Email: littlebigplay@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay
* Improve your English vocabulary and dictionary
recentChanges: * Added a PRACTICE mode in which you can practice spelling with no limits (no lives, no time limit)
* Please rate and review the game if you want to support it and want to see more and mainly free features. Thank you!
summary: Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational word game for all ages!
title: Spelling Master - Free

The car graphics are ok,  but the badges are removed to keep their license. Although you can change your name,  their is no multiplayer mode. Go ahead, download this garbage, you'll see what I mean.

descriptionHTML:
🔫Sniper Assassin Shot Kill 3D is War based 3D Game.
The user has to invade the enemy town and take out every single enemy solider in the call of country duty. The user has to invade all modern war zones in the world like Afghanistan, Iraq, Syria, Columbia, Mexico and Africa. The user has to take part in all classic world war fights like WW1 and WW2 battles. Trench battle is a hard battle assist your fellow soldiers and kill all the assassins, camouflages, contact killers and terrorists. The user can takes down aircraft, helicopters, fighter jets by using rocket launcher, bazooka, missile launcher and gunship. Join the military companies like head quarter, ALPHA, BRAVO and CHARLIE. Grab your ammo bag with knife, riffle, pistol, grenade, bomb,dagger, armor and life saver vest.

Multiple advanced sniper has been featured in the game.

◯ M24.
◯ Knight’s Armament Company SR-25.
◯ L42 Enfield (British).
◯ M21 Sniper Weapon System.
◯ PSG1.
◯ AS50.
◯ Dragunov SVD.
◯ CheyTac Intervention .408.
◯ Barrett .50 Cal.
◯ Accuracy International AWM.

Invade all the military bases and reclaim the land for your country so they can win the war. Gain control of all army base camps and take the furry the ultimate next level with aggression and bravery.

Lets explore some amazing features of the game

🔫 Aim on the enemy, Shoot him then reload easily.
🔫 Accurate Sniper scope, magazine and HUD.
🔫 Kill the enemy with efficiency and speed.
🔫 Be the assassin or camouflage to perform secrete mission.
🔫 Simulated controls to shoot and aim.
🔫 Ultra Realistic 3D graphics.
🔫 Save health for next level.
🔫 High definition(HD) display.
🔫 Take instructions from, search for the enemy and then shoot it.
🔫 simulated sound effects (SFX).
🔫 Visual effects (VFX).
🔫 Range of lethal GUNS and mortal WEAPONS.
🔫 Super fast processing with high rate of FPS.
🔫 Physics engine to create war situation
🔫 Intuitive design and easy game-play.
🔫 Specialized animations like bullet animation.
🔫 Guns with automatic reload.
🔫 Russian and american weaponry.
🔫 intense battles of Commandos and Terrorist.

The military camp feature some amazing war equipment like:

🚚 Army truck.
🚚 Army Jeeps.
🚚 Army Tanks.
🚚 Helicopters.
🚚 Air crafts.
🚚 Gunship.
🚚 Radars.
🚚 Advanced weaponry like (AWP, TRG42, M200, Barrett), Assault rifles, Machine guns (M4, AK47, MP5).
🚚 Huge range of snipers like (M249, M4A1, AK47, M3, MP5, MAC10, AUG, SG552, P90 and Desert Eagle).
summary: Sniper Assassin,Camouflages,Terrorists,Contract Killers Shooting in 3D World War
title: Sniper Assassin Shot Killer 3D

comments: Downloaded this through another app (free golden eagles) where if you downloaded and played this game, and got castle to level 10 would be rewarded. Sent off request to support a number of times with proof and no reply, and after a week still no reward.   So if you are downloading this to get reward from another app don't bother as you won't get it

Waste of time. I started playing the game as an offer to get points for another game. Vikings is not a bad game on itself but I feel cheated when I'm promised something and IronSource does not honor their part of the bargain. IronSource said the Plarium did not verify my completion of the offer, so I won't play it anymore nor try other Plarium content nor IronSource advertised games. The actual content is fine, but the business practices are deplorable.

Great time killer, I love the interaction and concept of the game. It can get a bit laggy at times and at it's worst, it will crash on you. The wait times are unbearable though. No ads at all since the first time I played too!

Too late to join this game. As soon as you lose your newbie protection you become a farm for higher level players, preventing you from progressing. Every morning you find all your resources pillaged and your troops dead or incapacitated. Maybe I'm just in the wrong timezone.

The game has the same problems as the other versions. The events boost strong players which makes the gap in strength larger. The premium items are overpriced. Probably the worst I have seen, there is no protection for your silver. This means stronger players always have a reason to attack someone weaker and there is no protection in place after being successfully attacked.

The game itself is great. Zero complaints there. But the fact that it I am unable to ever log in is infuriating. I've literally been zeroed out because the app won't let me log in... multiple times. It's absolutely ridiculous. Needs to be fixed.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the ruthless world of Vikings, where freedom, power, fear and violence reign supreme! Become the leader of a large army, lead your troops to victory and prove that you are the mightiest conqueror among a million players.

Try on the role of a wise and courageous Jarl, respected and feared by all! Construct magnificent buildings, take part in victorious campaigns, train your valiant warriors and boost your coffers. The superb graphics, compelling story and dynamic battles will have you hooked from the moment you start playing!

Features:
✔ Stunning graphics
✔ Free to play
✔ Numerous troop classes
✔ Multiple language options
✔ Fierce and thrilling battles with players from all over the world
✔ Handsome rewards for completing a variety of quests and tasks
✔ Weapons and gear crafting
✔ Become the leader or member of a mighty Clan

NOTE: Vikings: War of Clans is completely free to play, but has optional in-app purchases for real currency. You can turn off this option or set a password in your device settings. You will need an internet connection to play.

Vikings: War of Clans is an exciting MMORTS with players all over the globe. We are constantly improving gameplay and introducing exciting new updates for you. Feel free to share your ideas and suggestions — together we’ll make the Viking world even more enthralling!

You are a Viking! You are the Hero!

Excellent game. Best Idle, if not best game period on the market. Not really P2W, just pay to speed up. Heroes are amazing, unique and cool. There are also lots of other things to do besides just idle and wait to get stronger. So much content and you're given free gems from watching adds. Doesn't make you pay to succeed or have fun. Literally no complaints. And that's coming from someone that just in general has an issue with 99% of mobile  games. Download this!

Fun at first, but you have to pay a lot of real money for it to stay fun. Otherwise you have to wait weeks and months to progress. Some events can only be fully completed by spending hundreds of dollars (yeah, that much). Not worth it. If you have that much money, use it on something better than this. Improve your life, use your time better, don't waste it here. Good luck!

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

Not what I expected, given that my first impression of it was of IH being an "annoying add". Once I decided to pick it up though my thoughts changed rather drastically.   It's simple, it's fun and the warm colour palette of the graphics make a nice change compared to the widespread use of bleak colours in other games.   If you think you might enjoy this game, you sure are my friend.

descriptionHTML:
"Android Excellence Game" of Google Play. Play with 12 million global players!
Join millions of other players around the world and start your journey from Sara Forest to the High Heaven, leading your band of heroes into ancient ruins to battle the forces of darkness!

GAME FEATURES:

★IDLE System★
Set your heroes training while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger, gained new abilities, and ready for battle. Grow & Train a powerful squad without all the grinding!

★Evolving Strategy★
More than 200 Heroes in different factions with specific skills. Summon your Warriors, TRAIN them to become powerful heroes, or convert them into Spirit material for EVOLVING. Forge magical gears, and outfit your warriors for victory!

★TONS of Content★
With battlegrounds galore and dungeons aplenty, heroic quests, mysterious towers, arena, guild, much fun to enjoy!

★GUILD Wars★
Fight alongside your friends and players everywhere in a war for control of the floating continent. Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy!

Better than ML. Honestly, I play all sorts of Moba (or any video game), but this one really is different.  This game has issues, no argument with that. But when you compare it to "Mobile Legends: Bang Bang", you really see the difference. This one has top-notch graphics that I can probably compare to VG or PC Mobas. This game has awesome gameplay as well. There are almost overpowered heroes, but there are always heroes that counter them. ML looks like sht compared to this game.  The only downside that I can see is that, the controls are kinda off. Probably with an update, they can fix that. Will give five stars once that happens.
